detailed_translations.chinese: 息票；赠券；联票；[经] 配给券
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of printed paper that gives you the right to pay less for something or get something free

name: collegiate
trans: 大学的；学院的；大学生的

sentences.english: collegiate sports
sentences.chinese: 大学体育运动

detailed_translations.chinese: 大学的；学院的；大学生的
detailed_translations.english: relating to college or a college

name: acculturation
trans: 文化适应；文化移入；文化互渗（不同文化在频繁交流中的互相影响）

sentences.english: Culture conflict and culture syncretism are two of the most important stage of acculturation.
sentences.chinese: 文化冲突与文化融合是文化适应过程中两个最为重要的环节。

detailed_translations.chinese: 文化适应；文化移入；文化互渗（不同文化在频繁交流中的互相影响）

sentences.english: The magazine is unable to enter into any correspondence on medical matters.
sentences.chinese: 本杂志无法答复有关医学方面的来信。

sentences.english: All correspondence between us must cease.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间的所有通信必须停止。

detailed_translations.english: the process of sending and receiving letters

sentences.english: technology and its effects on modern society
sentences.chinese: 科技及其对现代社会的影响

sentences.english: Children are the most vulnerable members of society .
sentences.chinese: 儿童是最脆弱的社会成员。

detailed_translations.english: people in general, considered in relation to the laws, organizations etc that make it possible for them to live together

sentences.english: The company has consolidated its position as the country’s leading gas supplier.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司巩固了作为该国主要煤气供应商的地位。

sentences.english: We consolidate information from a wide range of sources.
sentences.chinese: 我们把来自各种渠道的信息加以汇总。

detailed_translations.english: to strengthen the position of power or success that you have, so that it becomes more effective or continues for longer

sentences.english: Hannah took a step backward.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜往后退了一步。

sentences.english: She pushed me and I fell backwards into the chair.
sentences.chinese: 她推了我一下，我便往后倒在椅子上。

detailed_translations.english: in the direction that is behind you

sentences.english: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
sentences.chinese: 每年他们都会审核我们的账目，以证明其准确合理。

detailed_translations.english: to officially examine a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct
an official examination of a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct

sentences.english: He received a six-month suspension for unprofessional behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他因有违职业道德的行为被停职六个月。

detailed_translations.english: when something is officially stopped for a period of time

name: capable
trans: 能干的，能胜任的；有才华的

sentences.english: I don’t think he’s capable of murder.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他没有能力杀人。

sentences.english: The company isn’t capable of handling an order that large.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司没有能力应付那么大的订单。

sentences.english: I’m perfectly capable of looking after myself, thank you!
sentences.chinese: 我完全能够自己照顾自己，多谢了！

detailed_translations.english: having the qualities or ability needed to do something

sentences.english: the headquarters of the United Nations
sentences.chinese: 联合国总部

sentences.english: Headquarters in Dublin has/have agreed.
sentences.chinese: 都柏林总部已经同意了

detailed_translations.english: the main building or offices used by a large company or organization

sentences.english: In many countries you have to haggle before you buy anything.
sentences.chinese: 在许多国家里买东西之前都得讨价还价。

sentences.english: Israel cannot "haggle its way out of" commitments, Erekat added in a statement. A settlement freeze was an Israeli obligation, he said, not a Palestinian precondition.
sentences.chinese: 艾拉卡特在声明中说，以色列不能“讨价还价，逃避承诺”；冻结定居点扩建是以色列的义务，而非巴勒斯坦提出的前提条件。

name: dimension
trans: 方面;[数] 维；尺寸；次元；容积 vt标出尺寸

sentences.english: You can have a spiritual dimension to your life without being religious.
sentences.chinese: 即使你不信宗教，也可以在生命中拥有精神层面的内容。

detailed_translations.chinese: 方面;[数] 维；尺寸；次元；容积 vt标出尺寸
detailed_translations.english: a part of a situation or a quality involved in it

sentences.english: The party’s share of the electorate has diminished steadily.
sentences.chinese: 支持这个政党的选民比例持续下降。

sentences.english: These drugs diminish blood flow to the brain.
sentences.chinese: 这些药物会减少流向脑部的血液量。

detailed_translations.english: to become or make something become smaller or less

detailed_translations.chinese: 减少， 减小， 降低
detailed_translations.english: to become or make something become smaller or less

name: downtime
trans: （工厂等由于检修，待料等的）停工期；[电子] 故障停机时间

sentences.english: Often, during semesters, you have down time when you can do some exercise.
sentences.chinese: 学期当中常常会有可供自由支配的时间来进行锻炼。

detailed_translations.chinese: （工厂等由于检修，待料等的）停工期；[电子] 故障停机时间
detailed_translations.english: the time when a computer is not working

sentences.english: He was sent on over 200 missions before being killed in action.
sentences.chinese: 在阵亡之前他奉命执行过200多次军事任务。

sentences.english: US troops taking part in the peacekeeping mission
sentences.chinese: 参与维和任务的美军

sentences.english: a British trade mission to Moscow
sentences.chinese: 派往莫斯科的英国贸易代表团

detailed_translations.english: an important job that involves travelling somewhere, done by a member of the air force, army etc, or by a spacecraft

sentences.english: It looks like we’ll have to stand – there are no seats left.
sentences.chinese: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.english: She stood in the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 她站在门口。

sentences.english: (= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.chinese: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.english: Don’t just stand there (= stand and not do anything ) – help me!
sentences.chinese: 不要光站在那里，帮帮我！

detailed_translations.english: to support yourself on your feet or be in an upright position
used to say that you do not like someone or something at all, or that you think that something is extremely unpleasant
a piece of furniture or equipment used to hold or support something

sentences.english: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
sentences.chinese: 警方及时赶到才阻止了事态恶化。

sentences.english: Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
sentences.chinese: 迟到的人有三分之一是因为交通问题。

sentences.english: The first arrivals at the concert got the best seats.
sentences.chinese: 最早来到音乐会的人坐上了最好的座位。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something arrives somewhere

sentences.english: I have an Irish passport.
sentences.chinese: 我持爱尔兰护照。

sentences.english: They need to check that your passport is in order.
sentences.chinese: 他们要检查一下你的护照是否有效。

detailed_translations.english: a small official document that you get from your government, that proves who you are, and which you need in order to leave your country and enter other countries

sentences.english: Notice that the St. Louis memo tiptoes around the question of telling a depositor that he has a demand deposit while telling the rest of the country that he has a time deposit.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，圣路易斯储备银行的备忘录一直在一个问题上遮遮掩掩，那就是把存款人的活期存款说成定期存款，欺骗国人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who puts money in a bank or other financial organization

sentences.english: Apart from the capital outlay of buying the machine, dishwashers can actually save you money.
sentences.chinese: 抛开购买的费用不讲，洗碗机实际上能给你省钱。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you have to spend in order to start a new business, activity etc

name: recipe
trans: 食谱；[临床] 处方；秘诀；烹饪法

sentences.english: a recipe book
sentences.chinese: 一本烹饪书

detailed_translations.english: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food

sentences.english: Our research has only recently begun to yield important results.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近我们的研究才开始取得重要成果。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a result, answer, or piece of information

name: concern
trans: 关系；关心；关心的事；忧虑

sentences.english: He was moved by her obvious concern.
sentences.chinese: 她明显的关心使他感动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 关切的事，有关的事；关心，挂念；关系，关联；公司，企业
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of wanting someone to be happy and healthy

detailed_translations.chinese: 涉及， 有关； 使关心， 使担心
detailed_translations.english: if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them

name: score
trans: 获得；评价；划线，刻划；把…记下

sentences.english: At half-time the score was one all.
sentences.chinese: 半场时的比分是一比一。

sentences.english: What’s the score?
sentences.chinese: 比分是多少？

sentences.english: Is anybody keeping score (= making a record of the score ) ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人负责记分？

sentences.english: The final score was Southampton two, Leeds United nil.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分是二比零，南安普敦队击败利兹联队。

sentences.english: The school’s test scores have not improved.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的考试成绩没有提高。

detailed_translations.english: the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

name: court
trans: 招致（失败、危险等）；向…献殷勤；设法获得

sentences.english: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.chinese: 这无法在法庭上证实。

sentences.english: The court case lasted six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼持续了六个星期。

sentences.english: Four people will appear in court today, charged with fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今天将有四个人因被指控犯有欺诈罪出庭受审。

sentences.english: The court ruled that no compensation was due.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决不予赔偿。

sentences.english: She threatened to take the magazine to court (= take legal action against them ) if they didn’t publish an immediate apology.
sentences.chinese: 她威胁说如果这家杂志不立刻刊登道歉声明，她就要把他们告上法庭。

detailed_translations.english: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the jury who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

sentences.english: Keep your receipt in case you want to bring it back.
sentences.chinese: 保留收据以备退货之需。

sentences.english: Can you give me a receipt?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我一个收条吗？

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper that you are given which shows that you have paid for something

name: bizarre
trans: 奇异的（指态度，容貌，款式等）

sentences.english: a bizarre coincidence
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的巧合

sentences.english: dancers in rather bizarre costumes
sentences.chinese: 身着奇装异服的舞者

detailed_translations.english: very unusual or strange

sentences.english: Parents should beware of imposing their own tastes on their children.
sentences.chinese: 父母应该提防把自己的兴趣强加给孩子。

sentences.english: A new tax was imposed on fuel.
sentences.chinese: 当局开始对燃油征收一项新税。

detailed_translations.english: If you impose your opinions or beliefs on other people, you try and make people accept them as a rule or as a model to copy

name: council
trans: 委员会；会议；理事会；地方议会；顾问班子

sentences.english: the council for civil liberties
sentences.chinese: 公民自由委员会

sentences.english: the UN Security Council
sentences.chinese: 联合国安全理事会

detailed_translations.english: a group of people that are chosen to make rules, laws, or decisions, or to give advice

name: cure
trans: 治疗；治愈；使硫化；加工处理
治疗；治愈；[临床] 疗法

sentences.english: Will you be able to cure him, Doctor?
sentences.chinese: 医生，你能把他治好吗？

sentences.english: The new treatment effected a miraculous cure.
sentences.chinese: 这种新疗法产生了奇迹般的疗效。

detailed_translations.english: to make a person or an animal healthy again after an illness
the act of making someone well again after an illness

name: integral
trans: 积分的；完整的，整体的；构成整体所必须的

sentences.english: Rituals, celebrations, and festivals form an integral part of every human society.
sentences.chinese: 仪式、庆典和节日是每个人类社会不可缺少的组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: Something that is an integral part of something is an essential part of that thing

name: break
trans: 破裂；间断；（持续一段时间的状况的）改变；间歇

sentences.english: I had to break a window to get into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我只得打破一扇窗户进屋。

detailed_translations.english: if you break something, you make it separate into two or more pieces, for example by hitting it, dropping it, or bending it

name: operation
trans: 操作；经营；[外科] 手术；[数][计] 运算

sentences.english: The whole operation is performed in less than three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 全部运算在三秒内完成。

detailed_translations.english: an action done by a computer

name: deliver
trans: 交付；发表；递送；释放；给予（打击）；给…接生

sentences.english: The morning mail has just been delivered.
sentences.chinese: 早晨的邮件刚送到。

sentences.english: Do you deliver on Saturdays?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你们送货吗？

sentences.english: I’m having some flowers delivered for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我在安排人给她送花祝贺生日。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person

name: pending
trans: 在…期间；直到…时为止；在等待…之际

sentences.english: Many trade disputes are pending, awaiting the outcome of the talks.
sentences.chinese: 许多贸易争端悬而未决，等待会谈结果。

detailed_translations.english: not yet decided or settled

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…期间；直到…时为止；在等待…之际
detailed_translations.english: while waiting for something, or until something happens

sentences.english: Diets are most effective when combined with exercise.
sentences.chinese: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.english: Ruth hesitated, uncertain of how to combine honesty and diplomacy in her answer.
sentences.chinese: 露丝犹豫了，她不知道怎样回答才能既诚实又婉转。

detailed_translations.english: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合企业； 联合收割机
detailed_translations.english: a machine used by farmers to cut grain, separate the seeds from it, and clean it

sentences.english: We hope these regions will embrace democratic reforms.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望这些地区会乐意接受民主改革。

sentences.english: Most West European countries have embraced the concept of high-speed rail networks with enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 大多数西欧国家都表现出极大的兴趣，欣然接受修建高速铁路网的想法。

detailed_translations.english: to eagerly accept a new idea, opinion, religion etc

sentences.english: A clearly quantifiable measure of quality is not necessary.
sentences.chinese: 一种确切的可计量的质量检测是不必要的。

detailed_translations.english: Something that is quantifiable can be measured or counted in a scientific way

name: contradictory
trans: 矛盾的；反对的；反驳的；抗辩的

sentences.english: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentences.chinese: 海关官员们对于这种设备做出了一系列相互矛盾的陈述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 矛盾的；反对的；反驳的；抗辩的
detailed_translations.english: two statements, beliefs etc that are contradictory are different and therefore cannot both be true or correct

sentences.english: One of the pictures is worth £50,000.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅画值5万英镑。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

detailed_translations.english: having a value in money, etc.
how good or useful something is or how important it is to people

sentences.english: ...an international media mogul.
sentences.chinese: ...一位国际传媒大亨。

sentences.english: ...Hollywood film moguls.
sentences.chinese: ...好莱坞电影业的巨头。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨头， 泰斗， 大人物， 巨擘
detailed_translations.english: A mogul is an important, rich, and powerful businessman, especially one in the news, film, or television industry

sentences.english: Sylvia fetched a towel from the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 西尔维娅从浴室拿来一条毛巾。

sentences.english: Fetch me a glass of water.
sentences.chinese: 给我拿杯水来。

detailed_translations.english: If you fetch something or someone, you go and get them from the place where they are

sentences.english: We’re sending out a mailshot telling our customers about our new products.
sentences.chinese: 我们将广发邮寄广告，向消费者介绍新产品。

detailed_translations.english: advertisements or information that a company sends to many people at one time by post

sentences.english: challenges to the existing power structure
sentences.chinese: 对现有权力结构的挑战

sentences.english: A new management structure has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 已推行一种新的管理结构。

sentences.english: molecular structures
sentences.chinese: 分子结构

detailed_translations.english: the way in which the parts of something are connected with each other and form a whole, or the thing that these parts make up

sentences.english: Before the lessor signs the lease, the lessee must receive a copy of the contract.
sentences.chinese: 在出租人签署租赁合同之前，承租人必须要收到合同副本。

sentences.english: If the customer a GREes to the leasing conditions offered to him, lessor and lessee will sign the leasing a GREement which is done by way of sending back a signed copy of the offer.
sentences.chinese: 如果客户同意租赁公司提出的租赁条件，出租人和租赁人通过寄回已签字承诺复印件的方式签订租赁合同。

sentences.english: Thee contract issuer or lessor shall, within 30 days from the date of issuance of contract or leasing, report the information about the contractor or lessee to the competent tax authorities.
sentences.chinese: 发包人或者出租人应当自发包或者出租之日起30日内将承包人或者承租人的有关情况向主管税务机关报告。

detailed_translations.english: someone who allows someone else to use their house, building, land etc for a period of time for payment

sentences.english: a heat regulator
sentences.chinese: 热调节器

detailed_translations.english: an instrument for controlling the temperature, speed etc of something

name: welfare
trans: 福利；幸福；福利事业；安宁
福利的；接受社会救济的

sentences.english: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
sentences.chinese: 我们唯一关心的是孩子们的幸福。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness

name: vitality
trans: 活力，生气；生命力，生动性

sentences.english: Despite her eighty years, Elsie was full of vitality.
sentences.chinese: 尽管已80岁了，埃尔茜依然充满活力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活力； 生机， 元气
detailed_translations.english: great energy and eagerness to do things

name: accountable
trans: 有责任的；有解释义务的；可解释的

sentences.english: The hospital should be held accountable for the quality of care it gives.
sentences.chinese: 医院应当对医护质量负责。

detailed_translations.english: responsible for the effects of your actions and willing to explain or be criticized for them

name: flexible
trans: 灵活的；柔韧的；易弯曲的

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

sentences.english: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.english: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.chinese: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the usual price of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…打折扣； 不信； 漠视， 低估
detailed_translations.english: If a shop or company discounts an amount or percentage from something that they are selling, they take the amount or percentage off the usual price

sentences.english: Ellis Island has become one of America's most popular tourist destinations.
sentences.chinese: 埃利斯岛已经成为美国最受欢迎的游览地之一。

detailed_translations.english: the place that someone or something is going to

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.english: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.chinese: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.chinese: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

detailed_translations.english: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

sentences.english: Her voice was full of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音充满了激情。

sentences.english: She was good at hiding her emotions.
sentences.chinese: 她很会掩饰自己的情感。

sentences.english: Kim received the news without showing any visible sign of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 金接到消息时丝毫不露声色。

detailed_translations.english: a strong human feeling such as love, hate, or anger

name: traffic
trans: 交通；运输；贸易；[通信] 通信量

sentences.english: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.chinese: 我国将和另外一个国家联合主办这次展览会。

sentences.english: You go to the exhibition centre, I must hie myself to tell the new matters.
sentences.chinese: 你去展览中心吧，我得赶紧汇报一下这个新情况。

sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.chinese: 李得到324票。

sentences.chinese: 产品通常用于在医疗保健领域和医药领域。

sentences.english: Why, with such a great healthcare system that promises the best care to everyone, would a person ever need to consult a search engine for an alternative?
sentences.chinese: 这样一个伟大的医疗保健系统许诺给每个人提供最好的照料，为什么还会有人求助于搜索引擎来寻找替代品？

sentences.english: They are the backbone of rural communities, and in many households they have the key responsibility for food security, education opportunities and healthcare.
sentences.chinese: 她们是农村社区的支柱，而且在许多家庭，她们负有粮食安全、教育机会和医疗保健的主要责任。

trans: 应用；申请；应用程序；敷用

sentences.chinese: 我填完申请表后把它寄了出去。

trans: 充电不足；索价低于常价；弹药装填不足
充电不足；低的索价；填不够量的火药

sentences.chinese: 接下来的五个月中，他们每个人都劝阻我不要做股票经纪人。

sentences.chinese: 他的父亲是个股票经纪人，在第二次世界大战时的巴黎遇见了斯通的母亲。

sentences.chinese: 他的老板因他习惯性旷工而解雇了他。

sentences.chinese: 拒学症---任何一种旷课，从恐惧到逃学，都能从孩子自身的品行和愿望上找到根源---而且是教育，心理学和儿科学等因素交织在一起。

detailed_translations.english: Absenteeism is the fact or habit of frequently being away from work or school, usually without a good reason

detailed_translations.chinese: 认可证颁发者（尤指批准书籍出版或戏剧演出的官员）

sentences.english: a tour guide

sentences.chinese: 一位有经验的登山向导

sentences.chinese: 大部分文书工作是我做的。

sentences.chinese: 此案正由一位顶尖律师负责处理。

sentences.english: Computers can handle huge amounts of data.
sentences.chinese: 计算机能处理大量数据。

sentences.chinese: 卫星信号接收器

sentences.chinese: 她拿起听筒，拨了他的电话号码。

sentences.english: The business is in the hands of the receivers .

detailed_translations.chinese: 电话听筒；接收器；〔破产企业或公司的〕管理人，接管人

sentences.chinese: 奥利维尔的表演补救了一出本是二流水平的戏。

sentences.english: They're going to have to show that the company is now solvent.
sentences.chinese: 他们将不得不证明公司现在是具备偿债能力的。

sentences.chinese: 我们为什么需要最佳的睡眠？

sentences.chinese: 他把她诱骗到家里，然后用父亲的枪把她打死。

someone who is a member etc of something, but who is at a lower level and has fewer rights

sentences.chinese: 眼下，改革是当务之急。

sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.chinese: 要使某人实现信息的价值，您需要相应地组织数据以允许快速的发现和利用。

sentences.chinese: 她一向准时赴约。

sentences.chinese: 不同的工人拥有不同技能。

name: itinerary
trans: 旅程，路线； 旅行日程
旅程的； 巡回的，流动的

sentences.chinese: 我们旅行计划的下一站是塞多纳。

sentences.english: The test was to assess aptitude rather than academic achievement.
sentences.chinese: 该测试将评估能力而不是学业成绩。

sentences.chinese: 斯旺西音乐艺术节

sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是基督教历的重大节日之一。

sentences.chinese: 该国目前正面临一场经济危机。

sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，我们又避免了一场财政危机。

sentences.english: Oil companies were heavily criticized when they made large profits during the oil crisis of the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 石油公司因在20世纪70年代的石油危机中赚取了丰厚利润而受到严厉抨击。

sentences.chinese: 汽车工业现在正处于危机之中。

sentences.chinese: 他看到有位黑衣女子坐在他的对面。

sentences.english: Ethiopia has no surplus food.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞俄比亚没有多余的食物。

detailed_translations.english: more than what is needed or used
an amount of something that is more than what is needed or used

sentences.english: Paul resented the fact that Carol didn’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 保罗非常气愤，因为卡萝尔不信任他。

detailed_translations.english: to feel angry or upset about a situation or about something that someone has done, especially because you think that it is not fair

sentences.english: Green teas are mostly from China or Japan.
sentences.chinese: 绿茶主要来自中国或日本。

sentences.english: There were about fifteen people in the lounge, mostly women.
sentences.chinese: 大厅里大约有15人，大部分是女性。

sentences.english: He blamed his parents. Mostly he blamed his dad.
sentences.chinese: 他责怪他的父母，主要是责怪他爸爸。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about most members of a group, most occasions, most parts of something etc

name: direct
trans: 直接的；直系的；亲身的；恰好的
直接地；正好；按直系关系

sentences.english: Experienced users have direct access to the main data files.
sentences.chinese: 高级用户可直接浏览主数据文档。

sentences.english: I’m not in direct contact with them.
sentences.chinese: 我和他们没有直接的联系。

sentences.english: Few policy-makers have had direct experience of business.
sentences.chinese: 决策者几乎都没有直接的从商经历。

sentences.english: Women often feel men are too direct and not sympathetic enough.
sentences.chinese: 女人常常觉得男人太直率，不够体贴。

detailed_translations.english: done without any other people, actions, processes etc coming between

sentences.english: the increasing globalization of world trade
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易的日益全球化

detailed_translations.english: the process of making something such as a business operate in a lot of different countries all around the world, or the result of this

name: prosecute
trans: 检举；贯彻；从事；依法进行

sentences.english: Mrs Lynn Smith, prosecuting, said the offence took place on January 27.
sentences.chinese: 控方律师林恩·史密斯夫人称案件发生于1月27日。

detailed_translations.english: if a lawyer prosecutes a case, he or she tries to prove that the person charged with a crime is guilty
to charge someone with a crime and try to show that they are guilty of it in a court of law

name: plausible
trans: 貌似可信的，花言巧语的；貌似真实的，貌似有理的

sentences.english: His story certainly sounds plausible.
sentences.chinese: 他的叙述听上去当然很合理。

sentences.english: a plausible explanation
sentences.chinese: 说得过去的解释

detailed_translations.chinese: 似有道理的， 似乎正确的， 貌似可信的
detailed_translations.english: reasonable and likely to be true or successful

sentences.english: In the absence of any evidence, the police had to let Myers go.
sentences.chinese: 警察没有证据，只好把迈尔斯放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席， 不在； 缺席的时间， 外出期； 缺乏， 不存在
detailed_translations.english: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away

sentences.english: ...the continuing profligacy of certain states.
sentences.chinese: ...某些州持续存在的挥霍浪费现象。

detailed_translations.english: Profligacy is the spending of too much money or the using of too much of something

name: factor
trans: 因素；要素；[物] 因数；代理人

sentences.english: The rise in crime is mainly due to social and economic factors.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率上升主要由社会和经济因素造成。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因素， 因子； 系数
detailed_translations.english: one of several things that influence or cause a situation

name: fault
trans: 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误

sentences.english: I’m really sorry - it’s all my fault.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很抱歉——都是我的错。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep well that night, but it was my own fault .
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我没有睡好，但这是我自己的问题。

detailed_translations.english: if something bad that has happened is your fault, you should be blamed for it, because you made a mistake or failed to do something

sentences.english: The company looks poised to make a significant breakthrough in China.
sentences.chinese: 该公司看上去稳将在中国实现一次重大突破。

detailed_translations.english: an important new discovery in something you are studying, especially one made after trying for a long time

name: affinity
trans: 密切关系；吸引力；姻亲关系；类同

sentences.english: He has a close affinity with the landscape and people he knew when he was growing up.
sentences.chinese: 他对他成长过程中所熟悉的景色和人们有一种很强的亲切感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 密切关系；吸引力；姻亲关系；类同
detailed_translations.english: a close relationship between two things because of qualities or features that they share

name: positioning
trans: [计] 定位（position的现在分词）；放置

sentences.english: How are you positioning yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎样为自己定位的？

sentences.english: When in cursor-positioning mode, the user can tab to, or position the cursor on, any character in the input field.
sentences.chinese: 当您处于游标定位模式时，用户可以切换，或者定位游标到输入区域的任何一个字符之上。

sentences.english: However it seems clear that the major players are aware of this opportunity and are positioning their services to capture it.
sentences.chinese: 然而主要的竞争参与者似乎已经明显地意识到这个机会，正在定位它们的服务来抓住这个机会。

detailed_translations.chinese: [计] 定位（position的现在分词）；放置

name: billing
trans: 广告；记帐；开发票；演员表；总账款

sentences.english: They couldn't afford to pay the bills.
sentences.chinese: 他们付不起账。

sentences.english: He paid his bill for the newspapers promptly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻付了报纸的帐单。

sentences.english: Are you going to bill me for this?
sentences.chinese: 你会为这开帐单给我吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 广告；记帐；开发票；演员表；总账款
detailed_translations.english: A bill is a written statement of money that you owe for goods or services
If you bill someone for goods or services you have provided them with, you give or send them a bill stating how much money they owe you for these goods or services

name: operative
trans: 有效的；运转着的；从事生产劳动的

sentences.english: Only one runway is operative.
sentences.chinese: 只有一条跑道可以使用。

sentences.english: the steps to be taken before the scheme can become operative
sentences.chinese: 这项计划实施之前需要采取的步骤

detailed_translations.chinese: 实施的； 工作着的； 操作的； 运转的
detailed_translations.english: working and able to be used
a worker, especially a factory worker – used in business

sentences.english: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.english: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

name: CEO
trans: 首席执行官；执行总裁（chief executive officer）

sentences.english: The book will show you what the best CEO should know.
sentences.chinese: 这本书会告诉你最好的执行总裁该了解什么。

sentences.english: You'd think it might be our CEO or the workers, but in fact, the stockholders control the money so they have the most power.
sentences.chinese: 你会认为有决定权的可能是我们的执行总裁或工人，可事实是股东控制着钱，所以他们的权利最大。

sentences.english: By the second one, I realized this was going to transform communications— not just for the CEO, but also it would change how we do business.
sentences.chinese: 但是我意识到，第二种方式能够改变人们交流的方式，不仅仅是首席执行官，它也会改变我们做生意的方式。

detailed_translations.english: the person with the most authority in a large company

name: producer
trans: 制作人，制片人；生产者；发生器

sentences.english: ...Saudi Arabia, the world's leading oil producer.
sentences.chinese: …沙特阿拉伯，世界上最重要的石油生产国。

sentences.english: Hollywood producers and movie stars
sentences.chinese: 好莱坞的制片人和影星

detailed_translations.english: a person, company, or country that makes or grows goods, foods, or materials

name: achievable
trans: 可完成的；可有成就的；做得成的

sentences.english: A 50% market share is achievable.
sentences.chinese: 百分之五十的市场占有率是可实现的。

sentences.english: It is often a good idea to start with smaller, easily achievable goals.
sentences.chinese: 以较小的、容易实现的目标来做开端经常是个好主意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可完成的；可有成就的；做得成的
detailed_translations.english: If you say that something you are trying to do is achievable, you mean that it is possible for you to succeed in doing it

name: reclaim
trans: 开拓；回收再利用；改造某人，使某人悔改

sentences.english: You may be entitled to reclaim some tax.
sentences.chinese: 你也许可以享受一定额度的退税。

detailed_translations.chinese: 开拓；回收再利用；改造某人，使某人悔改
detailed_translations.english: to get back an amount of money that you have paid

name: prompt
trans: 提示；促进；激起；（给演员）提白
提示；付款期限；DOS命令：改变DOS系统提示符的风格

sentences.english: Prompt action must be taken.
sentences.chinese: 必须立即采取行动。

sentences.english: Prompt payment is requested.
sentences.chinese: 请立即付款。

sentences.english: a prompt response
sentences.chinese: 迅速的答复

sentences.english: What prompted you to buy that suit?
sentences.chinese: 什么原因让你买下了那套西装？

detailed_translations.english: done quickly, immediately, or at the right time
to make someone decide to do something

sentences.english: The company has launched a whole raft of new software products.
sentences.chinese: 公司推出了大量新软件产品。

detailed_translations.english: a flat floating structure, usually made of pieces of wood tied together, used as a boat
to convey on or travel by raft, or make a raft from

sentences.english: Last year they sold twice as many computers as their competitors.
sentences.chinese: 去年他们的计算机销量是竞争对手的两倍。

detailed_translations.english: a person, team, company etc that is competing with another

name: variable
trans: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
[数] 变量；可变物，可变因素

sentences.english: Expect variable cloudiness and fog tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 预计明天多云有雾，天气多变。

sentences.english: Interest rates can be highly variable.
sentences.chinese: 利率有时会大幅波动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
detailed_translations.english: likely to change often

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
detailed_translations.english: something that may be different in different situations, so that you cannot be sure what will happen

name: oblige
trans: 迫使；强制；赐，施恩惠；责成；义务

sentences.english: Mr. Oakley has always been ready to oblige journalists with information.
sentences.chinese: 奥克利先生一直乐于提供信息帮助记者们。

sentences.english: We called up three economists to ask how to eliminate the deficit and they obliged with very straightforward answers.
sentences.chinese: 我们致电3位经济学家咨询消除赤字的方法，他们满足了我们的要求，给出了非常直接的答复。

detailed_translations.english: To oblige someone means to be helpful to them by doing what they have asked you to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 迫使；施恩于，帮…的忙；使感激
detailed_translations.english: if you are obliged to do something, you have to do it because the situation, the law, a duty etc makes it necessary

sentences.english: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.english: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.chinese: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

sentences.english: There has been a steady decrease of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 气温在持续下降。

detailed_translations.english: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less

name: agree
trans: 同意，赞成；承认；约定，商定

sentences.english: Teenagers and their parents rarely agree.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子跟父母意见很少一致。

detailed_translations.english: to have or express the same opinion about something as someone else

name: solicitor
trans: 律师；法务官；募捐者；掮客

sentences.english: You need to see a solicitor.
sentences.chinese: 你需要找个律师。

sentences.english: a small firm of solicitors
sentences.chinese: 一家小型律师事务所

detailed_translations.chinese: 律师；法务官；募捐者；掮客
detailed_translations.english: a type of lawyer in Britain who gives legal advice, prepares the necessary documents when property is bought or sold, and defends people, especially in the lower courts of law

sentences.english: They run a small grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 他们经营一家小食品杂货店。

detailed_translations.english: food and other goods that are sold by a grocer or a supermarket

sentences.english: This issue will be discussed in more detail in Chapter 5.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在第五章里作更为详细的论述。

detailed_translations.english: a single feature, fact, or piece of information about something
to list things or give all the facts or information about something

sentences.english: an inner room
sentences.chinese: 内室

sentences.english: inner London
sentences.chinese: 伦敦中心区

sentences.english: the inner ear
sentences.chinese: 内耳

sentences.english: Yoga gives me a sense of inner calm.
sentences.chinese: 练习瑜伽使我感到内心平和。

detailed_translations.english: on the inside or close to the centre of something

name: terms
trans: 地位，关系；[法] 条款；术语；措辞；价钱（term的复数形式）

sentences.english: Myocardial infarction is the medical term for a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 心肌梗塞是心脏病发作的医学术语。

sentences.english: He had been termed a temporary employee.
sentences.chinese: 他曾被称为临时工。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地位，关系；[法] 条款；术语；措辞；价钱（term的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: A term is a word or expression with a specific meaning, especially one which is used in relation to a particular subject
If you say that something is termed a particular thing, you mean that that is what people call it or that is their opinion of it

name: album
trans: 相簿；唱片集；集邮簿；签名纪念册

sentences.english: a photograph album
sentences.chinese: 相册

detailed_translations.chinese: 相簿；唱片集；集邮簿；签名纪念册
detailed_translations.english: a book that you put photographs, stamps etc in

sentences.english: Germany surrendered on May 7th, 1945.
sentences.chinese: 德国于 1945 年 5 月 7 日投降。

sentences.english: The terrorists were given ten minutes to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子被限定在十分钟之内投降。

detailed_translations.english: to say officially that you want to stop fighting, because you realize that you cannot win
to give up something or someone, especially because you are forced to
when you say officially that you want to stop fighting because you realize that you cannot win

sentences.english: Lindsay, like his films, is hard to categorize.
sentences.chinese: 就像他演的电影难于归类一样，很难说林赛属于哪一类演员。

sentences.english: Make a list of your child's toys and then categorize them as sociable or antisocial.
sentences.chinese: 把你孩子的玩具列个清单，然后将之分为交际型和非交际型。

detailed_translations.english: If you categorize people or things, you divide them into sets or you say which set they belong to

sentences.english: The strike caused widespread disruption .
sentences.chinese: 罢工造成了大规模的混乱。

sentences.english: a presidential candidate
sentences.chinese: 总统候选人

sentences.english: Candidates are not allowed to use a calculator in this exam.
sentences.chinese: 这次考试的应试者不可以使用计算器。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election

sentences.english: The doctor had encountered several similar cases in the past.
sentences.chinese: 那位医生过去曾碰到过好几个类似病例。

detailed_translations.english: to experience something, especially problems or opposition
an occasion when you meet someone, or do something with someone you do not know

sentences.english: Once he knew where we were, Lewis telegraphed every few hours.
sentences.chinese: 一知道我们在哪里，刘易斯就每隔几小时发一份电报来。

detailed_translations.english: an old-fashioned method of sending messages using radio or electrical signals
to send a message by telegraph

name: loose
trans: 宽松的；散漫的；不牢固的；不精确的

sentences.english: a loose floorboard
sentences.chinese: 松动的地板

sentences.english: This tooth feels very loose.
sentences.chinese: 这颗牙感觉松动得厉害。

sentences.english: The screw has come loose (= become loose ) .
sentences.chinese: 螺丝松了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宽松的；散漫的；不牢固的；不精确的
detailed_translations.english: not firmly fastened in place
to make something unpleasant begin

name: commit
trans: 犯罪，做错事；把交托给；指派…作战；使…承担义务

sentences.english: Women commit fewer crimes than men.
sentences.chinese: 女性犯罪比男性少。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯， 干； 使承诺； 把…托付给； 调拨…供使用， 拨出
detailed_translations.english: to do something wrong or illegal

sentences.english: So that satisfies the definition of validity.
sentences.chinese: 所以这满足了有效性的定义。

sentences.english: Does this argument satisfy the definition of validity or does it not?
sentences.chinese: 这个论点满足有效性的定义吗？,还是不满足？

sentences.english: While each of these might have some validity, in many cases the same general comments may also apply to many of the other projects you work on.
sentences.chinese: 尽管其中每个问题可能具有某些正确性，但是在许多情况下，一般性评论还可能适用于您从事的其他项目。

name: benchmarking
trans: 标杆管理；标记；确定基准点

detailed_translations.chinese: 标杆管理；标记；确定基准点

name: electricity
trans: 电力；电流；强烈的紧张情绪

sentences.english: The farm was very isolated, but it had electricity.
sentences.chinese: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

detailed_translations.english: the power that is carried by wires, cables etc, and is used to provide light or heat, to make machines work etc

name: conference
trans: 会议；讨论；协商；联盟；（正式）讨论会；[工会、工党用语]（每年的）大会

sentences.english: Representatives from over 100 countries attended the International Peace Conference in Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 来自一百多个国家的代表出席了在日内瓦举行的国际和平大会。

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting where a lot of people discuss important matters such as business, politics, or science, especially for several days

name: excursion
trans: 偏移；远足；短程旅行；离题；游览，游览团

sentences.english: They've gone on an excursion to York.
sentences.chinese: 他们到约克旅游去了。

detailed_translations.english: a short journey made for pleasure, especially one that has been organized for a group of people

name: barometer
trans: [气象] 气压计；晴雨表；显示变化的事物

sentences.english: The skin is an accurate barometer of emotional and physical health.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤是反映一个人身心健康状况的准确指标。

detailed_translations.chinese: [气象] 气压计；晴雨表；显示变化的事物
detailed_translations.english: an instrument that measures changes in the air pressure and the weather, or that calculates height above sea level

name: upscale
trans: 迎合高层次消费者的；质优价高的

sentences.english: an affluent upscale audience
sentences.chinese: 富裕的高消费观众

detailed_translations.chinese: 迎合高层次消费者的；质优价高的
detailed_translations.english: relating to people from a high social class who have a lot of money

sentences.english: He married Bea in 1925.
sentences.chinese: 他在1925年娶了贝亚。

sentences.english: I’m going to ask her to marry me on St Valentine’s Day.
sentences.chinese: 我打算在情人节向她求婚。

sentences.english: She married young (= at a young age ) .
sentences.chinese: 她结婚早。

sentences.english: People in higher social classes are more likely to marry late (= when they are older than is usual ) .
sentences.chinese: 社会阶层较高的人士倾向于晚婚。

sentences.english: Sophia had, in a sense, married beneath her (= married someone of a lower social class than her ) .
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在某种意义上是下嫁了。

detailed_translations.english: if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife
if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife

sentences.english: The study demonstrates the link between poverty and malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究证明了贫困与营养不良之间的联系。

sentences.english: The government now has an opportunity to demonstrate its commitment to reform.
sentences.chinese: 政府现在有机会表明改革的决心了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说明， 论证； 表露
detailed_translations.english: to show or prove something clearly

sentences.english: ...the consumer price index.
sentences.chinese: …消费价格指数。

detailed_translations.english: a computer program that can show and calculate financial information

决心；用意志力驱使；将（财产等）遗赠某人（will的现在分词）

sentences.chinese: 他们将把自己所取得的任何进展都告诉他。

name: branding

sentences.chinese: 本地公司选择场地及兴建主题公园，我们则负责品牌维护。

detailed_translations.english: resistant to discoloration, esp discoloration resulting from corrosion; rust-resistant

sentences.english: She was wearing a white blouse with frills at the cuffs.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一件袖口有褶边的白衬衫。

detailed_translations.english: a decoration that consists of narrow piece of cloth that has many small folds in it

trans: 外国的；外交的；异质的；不相关的

sentences.chinese: 你会讲外语吗？

trans: 经验主义的，完全根据经验的；实证的

trans: 专门从事；详细说明；特化

sentences.english: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.chinese: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.english: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.chinese: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

trans: 结果；成绩；答案；比赛结果

sentences.chinese: 你会如何应付失业及由此造成的收入损失？

trans: 模型；典型；模范；模特儿；样式

sentences.chinese: 蒸汽机车的活动模型

sentences.chinese: 你觉得我们需要叫救护车吗？

detailed_translations.english: a special vehicle that is used to take people who are ill or injured to hospital

sentences.english: I thought the medicine would make him sleep, but it had the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

sentences.chinese: 截然相反的是，阿什沃思的风格非常简单和现代。

a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else

sentences.chinese: 他欠我一大笔钱。

trans: 模范；完美之物；优秀之人

trans: 异国的；外来的；异国情调的

trans: 抬高原本约定的价格；向…索要高价

sentences.chinese: “那是什么？” 我装傻问道。

sentences.chinese: 学生必须学完这门课程。

used to emphasize that a quality or situation is as great as it could possibly be

sentences.chinese: 一周12个小时，这好像占用了你很多时间。

sentences.chinese: 13世纪城堡的杰出典范

trans: 停滞的；不景气的；污浊的；迟钝的

sentences.chinese: 死水塘

sentences.english: Doctors are required to keep patients’ records completely confidential .
sentences.chinese: 医生必须对病人的病历完全保密。

sentences.chinese: 保护热带雨林至关重要。

sentences.chinese: 一部沉闷的电影

sentences.chinese: 在我听来，这很无聊。

trans: [经] 滞胀，不景气状况下之物价上涨

sentences.chinese: 许多工业化经济将被推入到一个滞胀的循环中。

detailed_translations.english: If an economy is suffering from stagflation, inflation is high but there is no increase in the demand for goods or in the number of people who have jobs

name: uneconomical
trans: 不经济的；浪费的；不节俭的

sentences.chinese: 旧车往往很费钱。

name: variety

sentences.english: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.

sentences.english: a rare variety of orchid
sentences.chinese: 兰花的稀有品种

name: Rep

detailed_translations.english: a silk, wool, rayon, or cotton fabric with a transversely corded surface

sentences.chinese: 我们的报盘，每吨300欧元新加坡到岸价。

detailed_translations.english: a book made of plain paper on which you can write notes

sentences.english: the health service
sentences.chinese: 医疗保健服务

sentences.english: the postal service
sentences.chinese: 邮政服务

sentences.english: the police service
sentences.chinese: 警察部门

sentences.english: the prison service
sentences.chinese: 监狱系统

sentences.english: There has been a decline in public services in recent years.

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["the police, hospitals, fire service, and organizations that provide basic things such as water, gas, or electricity"],"COLLOINEXA":["the essential services"]}
sentences.chinese: 基础服务部门

detailed_translations.english: the official system for providing something, especially something that everyone in a country needs to have, or the official organization that provides it

detailed_translations.english: a path that forms a circle around an area, or a journey along this path

name: unparalleled
trans: 无比的；无双的；空前未有的

name: subliminal
trans: [生理] 阈下的；潜在意识的；微小得难以察觉的

detailed_translations.chinese: [生理] 阈下的；潜在意识的；微小得难以察觉的

trans: 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得

sentences.chinese: 我不会自称是女权主义者，但我希望看到更多的女性担任高职。

sentences.chinese: 如果投票率低于 50%，反对党领袖将宣布获胜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 声称，主张；对…提出要求，索取；使失踪或死亡；需要，值得
detailed_translations.english: to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved

detailed_translations.chinese: 要求； 认领； 索赔； 声称， 断言
detailed_translations.english: a statement that something is true, even though it has not been proved

sentences.english: every year at harvest time
sentences.chinese: 每年在收获的季节

sentences.english: Plum growers are expecting a bumper harvest this year.
sentences.chinese: 种植李树的农民期盼着今年有个好收成。

detailed_translations.english: the time when crops are gathered from the fields, or the act of gathering them
to gather crops from the fields

sentences.english: Is it the first signal of relationship disintegration?
sentences.chinese: 这是关系瓦解的第一个讯号吗？

sentences.english: The act or an instance of breaking up, as a division, dispersal, or disintegration.
sentences.chinese: 分散，分离分离的行为或实例，如分裂、分散或分解。

sentences.english: The total collapse of the Iron Curtain and the Berlin Wall came in 1989-1990, but the disintegration externally and internally started during my Administration.
sentences.chinese: 铁幕政策和柏林墙的全线坍塌发生在1989年到1990年，但是我执政期间就已经开始内在和外在的瓦解。

name: tight
trans: 紧的；密封的；绷紧的；麻烦的；严厉的；没空的；吝啬的

sentences.chinese: 紧身牛仔裤

sentences.chinese: 鞋子很紧，我几乎不能走路。

sentences.english: The jacket is rather a tight fit (= it fits too tightly ) .
sentences.chinese: 这件夹克衫太紧了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 紧的；密封的；绷紧的；麻烦的；严厉的；没空的；吝啬的
detailed_translations.english: tight clothes fit your body very closely, especially in a way that is uncomfortable
very firmly or closely

name: tension
trans: 张力，拉力；紧张，不安；电压

sentences.chinese: 这种紧张变得难以忍受，我真想大声尖叫。

sentences.english: Muscle tension can be a sign of stress.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉紧张可能是压力大的迹象。

sentences.english: This wire will take 50 pounds tension.
sentences.chinese: 这种金属线能承受50磅的张力。

sentences.english: Doctors think he will go blind.
sentences.chinese: 医生们认为他会失明。

name: brief
trans: 简短的，简洁的；短暂的，草率的

sentences.chinese: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Let’s keep this conversation brief; I have a plane to catch.
sentences.chinese: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.english: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.chinese: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

a short spoken or written statement giving facts about a law case

name: ledger
trans: 总帐，分户总帐；[会计] 分类帐；帐簿；底帐；（手脚架上的）横木

sentences.chinese: 所以它们应记入其它分类帐帐户，如像办公用品和应收帐款中。

sentences.chinese: 这种做法过去造成了大量的食物浪费。

detailed_translations.english: when something is lost or destroyed, especially in a way that is not useful or reasonable, or the amount that is lost or destroyed

trans: 季度的，按季度的；一年四次的
按季度，[农] 一季一次地；纵横四分地

sentences.chinese: 我们出版一份季刊。

sentences.english: The rent is payable quarterly.
sentences.chinese: 房租按季度支付。

sentences.english: It makes no difference whether dividends are paid quarterly or annually.
sentences.chinese: 红利是按季度还是按年度支付没有区别。

detailed_translations.chinese: 季度的，按季度的；一年四次的
detailed_translations.english: produced or happening four times a year

detailed_translations.chinese: 按季度，[农] 一季一次地；纵横四分地
detailed_translations.english: Quarterly is also an adverb
a magazine that is produced four times a year

name: waste
trans: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物

sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

detailed_translations.chinese: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物
detailed_translations.english: when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible
to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

sentences.chinese: 这家工厂将成为西方在东方投资的样板。

detailed_translations.english: A showpiece is something that is admired because it is the best thing of its type, especially something that is intended to be impressive

name: accept
trans: 接受；承认；承担；承兑；容纳

sentences.chinese: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.english: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.english: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.chinese: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.chinese: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.english: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that someone offers you, or to agree to do something that someone asks you to do

sentences.chinese: 公司正在搜集证明材料来支持自己的指控。

sentences.chinese: 你如何测试一个自动售货机的原型?。

sentences.english: What is the difference between these prototype declaration?
sentences.chinese: 这些原型声明的区别是什么？

sentences.english: But how do you come up with the architecture for this evolutionary prototype?
sentences.chinese: 但是你将如何为这个进化的原型提出系统的架构呢？

detailed_translations.english: the first form that a new design of a car, machine etc has, or a model of it used to test the design before it is produced

sentences.english: the director of merchandising
sentences.chinese: 销售总监

detailed_translations.english: the way in which shops and businesses try to sell their products

sentences.chinese: 如果他们拥有多个将要运行在同一个平台上的测试用例的话，那么他们能够同时选择多个配置，并且将这些配置批量应用到平台上。

name: cover
trans: 封面，封皮；盖子；掩蔽物;幌子，借口

sentences.chinese: 我刚报道完柬埔寨战争回来。

sentences.chinese: 她用打字机打出了一封信。

sentences.chinese: 我们将把你的详细资料存档。

sentences.chinese: 专家对犯罪行为的原因不能取得一致意见。

sentences.english: I was sure he was involved in some kind of criminal activity .
sentences.chinese: 我肯定他在从事某种犯罪活动。

sentences.chinese: 她没有犯罪。

sentences.chinese: 他遭到逮捕并被指控犯有刑事损坏罪。

sentences.chinese: 这名医生被判过失犯罪。

sentences.chinese: 我不想让你有任何虚假的希望。

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["a feeling of being safe when you are not really safe"],"COLLOINEXA":["a false sense of security"]}
sentences.chinese: 虚假的安全感

detailed_translations.english: based on incorrect information or ideas

name: affiliation
trans: 友好关系；加入；联盟；从属关系

sentences.chinese: 这些绑架者与任何军事组织都没有紧密联系。

sentences.chinese: 我们挑选新地毯花了很长时间。

sentences.english: A panel of judges will choose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 会由一个评判小组选出冠军。

sentences.chinese: 他说话时字斟句酌。

sentences.chinese: 根据自己的情况，你可以选择这种或那种方法。

detailed_translations.english: to choose one thing or do one thing instead of another

sentences.chinese: 被申请人收到仲裁申请书副本后，应当在仲裁规则规定的期限内向仲裁委员会提交答辩书。

sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

sentences.chinese: 动物园中的熊园

sentences.chinese: 将耕地圈起来用作牧场

detailed_translations.english: an area surrounded by a wall or fence, and used for a particular purpose

sentences.english: "They built up nice little pictures, " says David Villeneuve, program leader of attosecond science at the National Research Council of Canada in Ottawa.
sentences.chinese: “他们制作了漂亮的小图片，”David Villeneuve说，他是在加拿大渥太华的国家研究理事会的阿托秒科学的项目领导。

sentences.english: The attosecond X-ray pulses strong field electronic dynamics of both bound and continuum electrons can be characterized by measuring the high energy photoelectron spectra yielded by recollision.
sentences.chinese: 通过测量碰撞复合过程中的高能电子的辐射谱可以重构阿秒X光脉冲以及探测强场下束缚态和连续态电子动力学。

name: fascinating

sentences.chinese: 一本引人入胜的书

sentences.english: That sounds absolutely fascinating .
sentences.chinese: 那听起来极具吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 迷人的， 有极大吸引力的
detailed_translations.english: extremely interesting

sentences.english: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

sentences.english: Your building society or bank will help arrange a mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你加入的购房互助协会或银行将会给你安排抵押贷款。

sentences.chinese: 他们办理了一笔30年期的抵押贷款。

sentences.chinese: 我们决定用弗雷德的遣散费来偿清抵押贷款。

sentences.chinese: 抵押贷款利率到春季肯定还要上涨。

sentences.english: She was having trouble meeting her mortgage payments .
sentences.chinese: 她还抵押贷款有困难。

detailed_translations.english: a legal arrangement by which you borrow money from a bank or similar organization in order to buy a house, and pay back the money over a period of years

if you mortgage your home, land, or property, you borrow money, usually from a bank, and if you cannot pay back the money within a particular period of time, the bank has the right to sell your property in order to get the money you owe it

sentences.english: She looked self-conscious and guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去很不自然，很内疚的样子。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty of the death of PC Jones.
sentences.chinese: 关于警员琼斯的死，他被判无罪。

detailed_translations.english: feeling very ashamed and sad because you know that you have done something wrong

name: minister
trans: 执行牧师职务；辅助或伺候某人

sentences.english: a senior Cabinet minister
sentences.chinese: 资深的内阁部长

sentences.english: He concluded a deal with the Danish minister in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 他在华盛顿与丹麦公使达成了一项协议。

detailed_translations.english: a politician who is in charge of a government depart-ment, in Britain and some other countries

sentences.english: The food was served on long tables.
sentences.chinese: 食物放在长餐桌上供应。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with a flat top supported by legs

name: director
trans: 主任，主管；导演；人事助理

sentences.english: The company is run by a board of directors (= a group of directors ) .
sentences.chinese: 这家公司由董事会管理。

sentences.english: the director of education
sentences.chinese: 教育局局长

detailed_translations.chinese: 理事；导演；指导者；负责人
detailed_translations.english: someone who controls or manages a company

sentences.english: Some people believe the universe was created by a big explosion.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.english: Her behaviour is creating a lot of problems.
sentences.chinese: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.english: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

sentences.english: The announcement only succeeded in creating confusion.
sentences.chinese: 那通告反而引起了混乱。

detailed_translations.english: to make something exist that did not exist before

sentences.english: Try to satisfy your hunger by eating some fruit.
sentences.chinese: 吃些水果充充饥吧。

sentences.english: her hunger for knowledge
sentences.chinese: 她的求知欲

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you need to eat

sentences.english: The chick initially has no fear of man.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡最初不怕人。

detailed_translations.english: Man and men are sometimes used to refer to all human beings, including both males and females. Some people dislike this use.

sentences.english: Suppliers add computer consumables, office equipment and furniture to their product range.
sentences.chinese: 供应商把计算机耗材、办公设备及家具加进他们的产品范围中。

detailed_translations.english: Consumable is also a noun
consumable goods are intended to be used and then replaced

sentences.english: No-one enjoys paying tax.
sentences.chinese: 没人喜欢缴税。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you must pay to the government according to your income, property, goods etc and that is used to pay for public services

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…征税； 使负担重， 使费尽力气
detailed_translations.english: to charge a tax on something

sentences.english: My colleagues and I have expressed our high appreciation of their deeds of benevolence on many charity functions held by them.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的同事曾在多个华人社团赈灾活动上，向华侨华人的仁爱之举表示高度赞赏与敬意。

sentences.english: In his opinion, benevolence and expressions of gratitude appear to be subtle but powerful ways to bring happiness into one's life and to extend it.
sentences.chinese: 按他的观点，仁慈和表达感谢之情似乎以微妙但强有力的方式把幸福带到生活中，并使它得到延续。

sentences.english: ice cream in plastic containers
sentences.chinese: 塑料容器里的冰激凌

sentences.english: a container ship
sentences.chinese: 集装箱船

detailed_translations.english: something such as a box or bowl that you use to keep things in

name: experimentation
trans: 实验；试验；实验法；实验过程

sentences.english: The issue of animal experimentation is an emotive subject.
sentences.chinese: 动物实验问题是个敏感的话题。

sentences.english: experimentation with computer-assisted language learning
sentences.chinese: 计算机辅助语言学习的试验

detailed_translations.english: the process of performing scientific tests to find out if a particular idea is true or to obtain more information

name: shrink
trans: 收缩；畏缩；<俚>精神病学家

sentences.english: I’m worried about washing that shirt in case it shrinks.
sentences.chinese: 我不太敢洗那件衬衫，怕它会缩水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 起皱； 收缩； 退缩， 畏缩
detailed_translations.english: to become smaller, or to make something smaller, through the effects of heat or water

name: position
trans: 位置，方位；职位，工作；姿态；站位

sentences.english: Lie in a comfortable position .
sentences.chinese: 以一个舒服的姿势躺下。

sentences.english: Our hotel was in a superb central position near St Mark’s Square.
sentences.chinese: 我们的酒店处于极佳的中心位置，在圣马克广场附近。

sentences.english: Bruce is thinking of applying for the position.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯正在考虑申请那个职位。

sentences.chinese: 最后，我们有治外法权，并利用这一法律的好处，以极为活跃在鸦片贸易。

sentences.chinese: 这也就是说，如果是在战斗或值勤期间，犯罪的美国军人还是享有治外法权。

sentences.chinese: 日本是亚洲第一个现代化的国家就其本身来说，远离殖民地或半殖民地的控制之苦，甚至，1895年以后，治外法权。

detailed_translations.english: exactly correct or perfect in every detail

sentences.chinese: 他出人意料地做出一个大胆举动，威胁要起诉这家公司。

sentences.chinese: 她放肆地直闯进他的办公室。

sentences.chinese: 酒店客房里有一瓶免费赠送的香槟。

sentences.chinese: 我有几张今晚的免费戏票。

sentences.chinese: 她承认自己无法作出妥协。

an agreement that is achieved after everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first, or the act of making this agreement

sentences.chinese: 您还没有选择一个加密密钥。

sentences.chinese: 我非常喜欢这个特性，但是在安装是勾选了这个设置后，输入加密密钥的请求却无从找寻。

sentences.chinese: 我写信是要确认/询问/通知你…

sentences.english: I recently e-mailed one website to enquire why my goods had not yet arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我最近给一个网站发邮件去询问为什么我订购的商品还没有到达。

sentences.chinese: 你们无论进那一城，那一村，要打听那里谁是好人，就住在他家，直住到走的时候。

sentences.english: I think that is because we unnecessarily complicate it.
sentences.chinese: 我想这是因为我们不必要地将生活复杂化了。

sentences.english: If the answer to all of these questions is no, a framework will only complicate matters.
sentences.chinese: 如果所有这些问题的答案都为否，那么使用框架只会把事情变复杂。

sentences.chinese: 选择服务是比较难以正确实现的服务之一，因为它具有一些使实现复杂化的有价值的功能。

sentences.english: One, for example, is we have a remarkable capacity for rationalization.
sentences.chinese: 例如，其一，每个人都具有非凡的合理化能力。

sentences.english: There is rationalization, which is that when you do something or think something bad you rationalize it and you give it a more socially acceptable explanation.

sentences.english: The professor stands accused of (=  has been accused of  ) stealing his student’s ideas and publishing them.

sentences.chinese: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.chinese: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.chinese: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.english: The mother of the murder victim wept in court.

sentences.chinese: 她本想成为第一位登上珠穆朗玛峰的女性，而且差一点就成功了。

detailed_translations.english: to send money electronically
thin metal in the form of a thread, or a piece of this
to send money electronically

trans: 信；字母，文字；证书；文学，学问；字面意义

sentences.chinese: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.english: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.

trans: 分类；把…分等级；把…归入某等级，把…看作（或分类、归类）；把…编入某一班级
极好的；很好的，优秀的，出色的

sentences.chinese: 宾馆对住客个人财物的丢失和损坏概不负责。

sentences.chinese: ...能让我们大幅提高产量的技术。

detailed_translations.english: The throughput of an organization or system is the amount of things it can do or deal with in a particular period of time

trans: [航]陆标；地标；界标；里程碑；纪念碑；地界标；划时代的事

sentences.chinese: 这些化学品中有些对环境非常有害。

当销售员，当店员；当职员

sentences.english: a clerk in a commercial firm
sentences.chinese: 一家商行的文员

detailed_translations.chinese: 职员，办事员；店员；书记；记账员；<古>牧师，教士

sentences.chinese: 炸弹在早上9点半爆炸。

sentences.chinese: 我们艰难地穿过雪地走回了家。

sentences.chinese: 我们不情愿的开始长途跋涉回家。

冲突，抵触；砰地相碰撞，发出铿锵声

sentences.chinese: 缺乏管理技巧

sentences.chinese: 如今人们在电视上看见性爱镜头不太会感到吃惊了。

detailed_translations.english: now, compared with what happened in the past

sentences.chinese: 探讨了如何完善土地征收中对土地承包经营权的保护。

sentences.chinese: 就是这样，罗斯福总统在丹尼尔斯必不可少的帮助下，将没收事件变成对美国人民有利的事情。

sentences.chinese: 他想要一个订书机， 但她没有。

sentences.chinese: “订书机”是一种能将一小块金属穿过一沓纸把它们放在一起的小物体。

sentences.chinese: 你在心里对自己说“如果下次乔安娜再嚼口香糖的话，我发誓一定冲过去将订书机甩到她位置上。

trans: 拆除；取消；解散；除掉…的覆盖物

sentences.chinese: 可是我一定会竭力打消一切苦痛的念头，只去想一些能使我高兴的事───譬如想想你的亲切以及亲爱的舅父母对我始终如一的关切。

sentences.english: advancements in science
sentences.chinese: 科学进步

sentences.english: Perhaps the best reason for regulators to be suspicious about innovation is that so much of it in the modern world is aimed at facilitating regulatory and tax arbitrage.
sentences.chinese: 监管者之所以对创新怀有疑虑，最关键的原因可能在于，现代社会中太多创新的目的都是为监管和税收套利提供便利。

detailed_translations.english: a regulatory authority has the official power to control an activity and to make sure that it is done in a satisfactory way

sentences.chinese: 利率已经定为6.5%。

sentences.chinese: 架子应当用螺丝固定在墙上。

sentences.chinese: 系统中有任何变化都会通知你。

sentences.chinese: 8月份我们接到通知，说我们的文章不予采用。

sentences.chinese: 法官判定孩子的监护权归她。

sentences.chinese: 红灯表示“停”。

trans: 持牌人；执照持有者；获许可的人；领到执照的人

sentences.chinese: 尽管服务所具有的无形特性，使得服务商标被许可使用人无法直接在其提供的服务上标明其名称及地址。

sentences.chinese: A公司每月生产6,000件产品，每件单价0.33美元。

name: fine
trans: 好的；优良的；细小的，精美的；健康的；晴朗的

sentences.chinese: 很多人认为贝多芬的第五交响曲是他最杰出的作品。

sentences.english: He’s a very fine player.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很优秀的选手。

sentences.english: It’s a fine idea.
sentences.chinese: 这是个很妙的主意。

sentences.english: Hatfield House is a fine example of Jacobean architecture.
sentences.chinese: 哈特菲尔德宅第是英王詹姆斯一世时期建筑的典范。

sentences.english: The restaurant was chosen for its good food and fine wines .
sentences.chinese: 这家餐厅因其美酒佳肴而入选。

sentences.chinese: 车子涉水之后要检验一下刹车。

sentences.chinese: 我最终及时刹了车。

sentences.chinese: 莫伊拉猛踩刹车。

sentences.chinese: 刹车的刺耳噪音

sentences.chinese: 他突然急刹车，想避开那条狗。

海运业；舰队；水兵；（海军）士兵或军官

sentences.english: the enormous variety of marine life
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物繁多的种类

sentences.chinese: 石油污染对海洋哺乳动物的影响

sentences.chinese: 这个软件让你可以在个人电脑上浏览拍摄的图像。

sentences.chinese: 这家商店每天的利润一般在500美元左右。

sentences.chinese: 那只狗把他的手咬出血了。

sentences.chinese: 利特曼拒绝公开讨论此案。

sentences.english: So how do we strengthen our skeptical skills?
sentences.chinese: 那么，我们如何加强自身的怀疑技能呢？

sentences.chinese: 大爷：我老人家一开始也是很怀疑的。但是这个是事实。这个发现可以被反复验证，我们正在等待别的实验是的验证。

name: consign
trans: 交付；托运；寄存；把…委托给

trans: 开始；机会；通路；空缺的职位

sentences.chinese: 在这个阶段为了检查省略的阴影和过亮的部分，我还会检查直方图，如有必要增加一些填充的光线或做一些补救。

sentences.chinese: 如果查询谓词中引用的列存在显著的数据值倾斜，那么要确保 DB2 了解这一情况，最好是使用 RUNSTATS 生成列值柱状图统计数据。

detailed_translations.english: a  bar chart

sentences.chinese: 她开始在这家公司做临时雇员。

sentences.chinese: 拆掉后，计划是将这个地块变成商业综合体，里面将设立室内主题公园，巨型五星级酒店，大型超市以及办公大楼。

sentences.chinese: 树上钉着一块写有“禁止钓鱼”的牌子。

trans: 知识，学问；知道，认识；学科

sentences.chinese: 他对美国历史所知不多。

sentences.english: Evans denied all knowledge of the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯说他对这次抢劫一无所知。

detailed_translations.english: the information, skills, and understanding that you have gained through learning or experience

name: smooth
trans: 使光滑；消除（障碍等）；使优雅；缓和

sentences.chinese: 她的皮肤摸上去又滑又凉。

sentences.english: a smooth pebble

sentences.chinese: 石阶被磨得光溜溜的了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使光滑；消除（障碍等）；使优雅；缓和

If you smooth something, you move your hands over its surface to make it smooth and flat

name: scandal
trans: 丑闻；流言蜚语；诽谤；公愤

sentences.chinese: 他离开妻子成了一大丑闻。

sentences.chinese: 联邦储备银行想让各家银行继续贷款给信用良好的借款人。

sentences.chinese: 他比主要对手早39秒到达终点。

sentences.chinese: 那天早上，他注意到弗兰卡情绪的变化。

sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.chinese: …航空工业。

sentences.chinese: 这家公司从石油生意中抽身。

sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

sentences.chinese: 母亲本能的爱

sentences.chinese: 这是什么意思？我让你一小时之前就要到的！

trans: [地理][水文] 冰碛；放钱的抽屉；备用现金

sentences.chinese: 你做业务要储备足够的钱。

until

sentences.chinese: 电子记事本

detailed_translations.english: electronic equipment, such as computers and televisions, uses electricity that has passed through computer chips, transistors etc

sentences.english: Many people drowned when the boat overturned.
sentences.chinese: 船翻后许多人淹死了。

sentences.english: Jane was drowned in the river.
sentences.chinese: 简在那条河里溺水身亡。

detailed_translations.english: to die from being under water for too long, or to kill someone in this way

sentences.chinese: 被误抓的人有可能得到补偿费。

detailed_translations.english: money paid to someone because they have suffered injury or loss, or because something they own has been damaged

name: register

登记；注册；记录；寄存器；登记簿

sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

sentences.chinese: 土著人被征服，并遭受剥削。

sentences.chinese: 我有几千美元想作投资。

sentences.chinese: 那个家我们投入得太多，要离开真的很难。

实用的；通用的；有多种用途的

sentences.chinese: 你的房租包括公用事业费吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 公用事业〔如煤气、电力等〕
detailed_translations.english: a service such as gas or electricity provided for people to use

sentences.english: And operational downtime caused by reliability or performance problems can incur opportunity costs if customers are unable to access your system or the business is unable to do its work.
sentences.chinese: 并且如果顾客不能访问你的系统或业务不能进行工作，那么由可靠性或性能问题引起的运作停工就会招致机会成本。

detailed_translations.english: if you incur a cost, debt, or a fine, you have to pay money because of something you have done

sentences.chinese: 人手不足严重妨碍了整个进度。

detailed_translations.english: a place in a road where the traffic cannot pass easily, so that there are a lot of delays

name: elegant
trans: 高雅的，优雅的；讲究的；简炼的；简洁的

sentences.chinese: 身材高挑、举止优雅的年轻女子

sentences.english: You can dine in elegant surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在雅致的环境中进餐。

detailed_translations.english: beautiful, attractive, or graceful

sentences.chinese: 即使是一桩婚姻注定要遭受失败，在家庭法中也将是趋向于在法庭外解决争执，典型的是通过调解。

sentences.english: Only solve those existing problems, the people's mediation can play better efficiency and cost advantages, and prevent and dissolve the dispute.
sentences.chinese: 解决好这几方面存在的问题才能更好发挥人民调解的效率与成本优势及预防、化解纠纷的能力。

sentences.english: It has been wisely negotiating with Syria via Turkey, and engaging Hamas on a truce deal through the mediation of Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 它明智地透过土耳其与叙利亚谈判，并通过埃及的仲裁与哈马斯达成停战协议。

sentences.english: India has a good scientific research base.
sentences.chinese: 印度有良好的科研基础。

detailed_translations.english: the most important part of something, from which new ideas develop

sentences.chinese: 这些经济问题早在现任政府就职之前就已出现。

detailed_translations.english: to come from an earlier time in history than something else
an earlier date

sentences.english: When our vacations coincided, we often holidayed together.
sentences.chinese: 我们的假期要是凑巧赶在一起，我们常常会一同去度假。

sentences.english: The interests of the US and those of the islanders may not coincide.
sentences.chinese: 美国的利益和这些岛民的利益可能并不一致。

sentences.english: It was difficult to get precise information.
sentences.chinese: 很难得到确切的消息。

sentences.english: ‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise .’

sentences.chinese: 他向他们笑了笑表示谢意。
