sentences.chinese: 你为什么老是要把一切都弄糟呢？

detailed_translations.english: to have a bad effect on something so that it is no longer attractive, enjoyable, useful etc

sentences.english: an old custom that has vanished altogether
sentences.chinese: 一个彻底消亡的古老习俗

sentences.english: Congress could ban the procession altogether.
sentences.chinese: 国会可以完全禁止这次游行。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something has been done completely or has finished completely
not wearing any clothes – used humorously

sentences.english: I can do my packing the night before we leave.
sentences.chinese: 我可以出发前一晚收拾行李。

detailed_translations.english: when you put things into cases or boxes so that you can send or take them somewhere

sentences.english: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.english: fund-raising activities
sentences.chinese: 筹款活动

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

sentences.english: If you wish to make a complaint, you should see the manager.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要投诉，应该去找经理。

sentences.english: The sales assistants are trained to deal with customer complaints in a friendly manner.
sentences.chinese: 售货员都受过培训，要以友好的态度处理顾客的投诉。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which someone complains about something

name: calendar
trans: 日历；[天] 历法；日程表
将…列入表中；将…排入日程表

sentences.english: There was a calendar on the wall above, with large squares around the dates.
sentences.chinese: 墙的上方曾有一本日历，日期框在大方格里。

sentences.english: The Christian calendar was originally based on the Julian calendar of the Romans.
sentences.chinese: 公历最初是基于罗马的儒略历的。

detailed_translations.english: a set of pages that show the days, weeks, and months of a particular year, that you usually hang on a wall

sentences.english: What recreational facilities are now available?
sentences.chinese: 什么娱乐设施现在是可用的？

detailed_translations.english: Facilities are buildings, pieces of equipment, or services that are provided for a particular purpose

name: law
trans: 法律；规律；法治；法学；诉讼；司法界

sentences.english: Elected officials ought to obey the law.
sentences.chinese: 民选官员理应遵守法律。

sentences.english: laws passed by Parliament
sentences.chinese: 议会通过的法律

detailed_translations.english: the whole system of rules that people in a particular country or area must obey

sentences.english: There's little advantage to amortizing the loan, especially on a 30 or 40-year basis.
sentences.chinese: 分期偿还这项贷款没有什么好处，尤其是按30或40年偿还。

detailed_translations.english: to pay a debt by making regular payments

sentences.english: Send them a copy of your CV.
sentences.chinese: 给他们寄一份你的简历。

sentences.english: I need to update my CV.
sentences.chinese: 我需要更新我的简历。

sentences.english: Finally, take one more minute to check spelling mistakes or logical flaws of your CV and cover letter before you send them out. Good luck!
sentences.chinese: 最后，在寄出你的简历和求职信之前，多花一分钟时间检查拼写错误或逻辑漏洞，这不会是无用功。祝你好运！

detailed_translations.english: a short written document that lists your education and previous jobs, which you send to employers when you are looking for a job

name: depend
trans: 依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖

sentences.english: He depended on his writing for his income.
sentences.chinese: 他靠写作谋生。

sentences.english: You can depend on Jane – she always keeps her promises.
sentences.chinese: 你可以相信简——她一向都信守诺言。

detailed_translations.english: to need the support, help, or existence of someone or something in order to exist, be healthy, be successful etc

name: lay
trans: 躺下；产卵；搁放；放置；铺放；涂，敷
世俗的；外行的；没有经验的
位置；短诗；花纹方向；叙事诗；性伙伴

sentences.english: He laid his hand on my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他把一只手搭在我的肩上。

sentences.english: They laid a wreath at the place where so many people died.
sentences.chinese: 他们在这么多人丧生的地方放了一个花圈。

sentences.english: Lay the material flat on the table.
sentences.chinese: 把布料平铺在桌上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 躺下；产卵；搁放；放置；铺放；涂，敷
detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something down carefully into a flat position

detailed_translations.chinese: 世俗的；外行的；没有经验的
detailed_translations.english: not trained or not knowing much about a particular profession or subject

detailed_translations.chinese: 位置；短诗；花纹方向；叙事诗；性伙伴
detailed_translations.english: a poem or song

name: kite
trans: 使用空头支票；像风筝一样飞；轻快地移动

sentences.english: She has a blue and green kite.
sentences.chinese: 她有一只蓝色和绿色的风筝。

sentences.english: The child tailed his kite.
sentences.chinese: 小孩儿给自己的风筝装了尾巴。

sentences.english: He tried to fly his kite.
sentences.chinese: 他试图放飞他的风筝。

detailed_translations.english: a light frame covered in coloured paper or plastic that you let fly in the air on the end of one or two long strings

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用空头支票；像风筝一样飞；轻快地移动

sentences.english: The miners rode a conveyance attached to a cable made of braided steel wire.
sentences.chinese: 矿工们乘坐连着钢索的缆车。

sentences.english: cables and switches for computers
sentences.chinese: 电脑的缆线和开关

sentences.english: She sent a cable to her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她给母亲发了封电报。

detailed_translations.english: a thick strong metal rope used on ships, to support bridges etc

name: worthwhile
trans: 值得做的，值得花时间的

sentences.english: He wanted to do a worthwhile job.
sentences.chinese: 他想做有意义的工作。

sentences.english: We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (= one that helps people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把这笔钱投入到慈善事业中。

detailed_translations.english: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it

sentences.english: There are several departures for New York every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天有好几个班次去纽约。

detailed_translations.english: an act of leaving a place, especially at the start of a journey

name: disrupt
trans: 破坏；使瓦解；使分裂；使中断；使陷于混乱

sentences.english: Traffic was disrupted by a hoax bomb.
sentences.chinese: 有人虚报有炸弹，造成了交通混乱。

sentences.english: Climate change could disrupt the agricultural economy.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化可能给农业经济带来不良影响。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from continuing in its usual way by causing problems

sentences.english: Someone stole my credit card and forged my signature.
sentences.chinese: 有人偷了我的信用卡，并假冒我的签名。

sentences.english: a forged passport
sentences.chinese: 假护照

detailed_translations.english: to move somewhere or continue doing something in a steady determined way
to illegally copy something, especially something printed or written, to make people think that it is real
a place where metal is heated and shaped into objects

name: theoretical
trans: 理论的；理论上的；假设的；推理的

sentences.english: These findings have both theoretical and practical applications.
sentences.chinese: 这些发现具有理论和实际的应用。

sentences.english: In this process, an interaction of theoretical study with practical work . should be strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 在这个过程中，要加强理论的探讨和工作推进的互动作用。

sentences.english: Researchers have tossed around theoretical calculations of using just aluminum and water for rocket propellant in the past.
sentences.chinese: 研究者在过去辗转不安的进行理论计算，仅仅只用铝和水作为火箭燃料。

sentences.english: Food was often scarce in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 冬季常常粮食短缺。

sentences.english: There was fierce competition for the scarce resources .
sentences.chinese: 对这些紧缺资源的争夺非常激烈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺乏的， 不足的； 稀少的， 罕见的
detailed_translations.english: if something is scarce, there is not very much of it available

sentences.english: By dint of discussing political matters, vaguely and without precision, from the point of view of the general amelioration of the fate of all men, they came to say a little more than "yes" and "no."
sentences.chinese: 当马吕斯把关于改善全民生活的政治问题含糊而不明确地摊在桌上谈时，他们相互要比说简单的“是”“不”稍稍多说了几句。

sentences.english: I've heard that Liebig has made some wonderful discoveries in the amelioration of soils.
sentences.chinese: 我听人说利比黑在改善土壤这方面有过很了不得的发现。

detailed_translations.english: the act or an instance of ameliorating or the state of being ameliorated

name: inflationary
trans: 通货膨胀的；通货膨胀倾向的；通货膨胀引起的

sentences.english: inflationary pressures in the economy
sentences.chinese: 经济上的通货膨胀压力

sentences.english: A new round of wage increases could trigger an inflationary spiral (= a continuing rise in both wages and prices ).
sentences.chinese: 新一轮的加薪会引发工资与物价的交互上涨。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通货膨胀的；通货膨胀倾向的；通货膨胀引起的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or causing price increases

name: authorize
trans: 批准，认可；授权给；委托代替

sentences.english: an authorized biography
sentences.chinese: 授权传记

detailed_translations.english: to give official permission for something

name: orient
trans: 使适应；确定方向；使朝东

sentences.english: She looked at the street names, trying to orient herself.
sentences.chinese: 她看看街名，试图确定自己的方位。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应；确定方向；使朝东
detailed_translations.english: to find exactly where you are by looking around you or using a map
the eastern part of the world, especially China and Japan
to find exactly where you are by looking around you or using a map

name: great
trans: 伟大的，重大的；极好的，好的；主要的

sentences.english: The movie was a great success.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片大获成功。

sentences.english: The news came as possibly the greatest shock of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个消息可能是我一生中最大的打击。

sentences.english: The paintings cost a great deal (= a lot ) of money.
sentences.chinese: 这些画价值不菲。

sentences.english: John always takes great care over his work.
sentences.chinese: 约翰工作时总是非常小心。

sentences.english: It’s a great pity that none of his poems survive.
sentences.chinese: 非常遗憾，他的诗歌没有一首保存下来。

sentences.english: The temptation was too great to resist.
sentences.chinese: 诱惑太大，难以抵挡。

sentences.english: one of the greatest scientific achievements of our time
sentences.chinese: 我们这个时代最伟大的科学成就之一

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or degree

name: nuclear
trans: 原子能的；[细胞] 细胞核的；中心的；原子核的

sentences.english: France’s reliance on nuclear energy
sentences.chinese: 法国对核能的依赖

sentences.english: a nuclear power station
sentences.chinese: 核电站

sentences.english: a nuclear-powered submarine
sentences.chinese: 核动力潜艇

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving the nucleus of an atom, or the energy produced when the nucleus of an atom is either split or joined with the nucleus of another atom

sentences.english: They get their money from various sources.
sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

detailed_translations.english: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

name: obligate
trans: 使负义务；强使，强迫；对…施以恩惠
有责任的，有义务的；必需的

sentences.english: The ruling obligates airlines to release information about their flight delays.
sentences.chinese: 这一裁决迫使航空公司公布航班晚点信息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使负义务；强使，强迫；对…施以恩惠
detailed_translations.english: to make someone have to do something, because it is the law, their duty, or the right thing to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 有责任的，有义务的；必需的

name: piracy
trans: 海盗行为；剽窃；著作权侵害；非法翻印

sentences.english: software piracy
sentences.chinese: 软件盗版

detailed_translations.chinese: 海盗行为；剽窃；著作权侵害；非法翻印
detailed_translations.english: the crime of illegally copying and selling books, tapes, videos, computer programs etc

sentences.english: All the battleships can refresh in this harbor.
sentences.chinese: 所有战舰都能在这个港口装上补充供应品。

sentences.english: It is the harbor of Athens.
sentences.chinese: 它是雅典的港口城。

sentences.english: She stands on a small island in New York harbor, near the great city.
sentences.chinese: 她竖立在纽约海港的一座小岛，并紧挨着纽约这座大城市。

sentences.english: He was always criticising his wife’s appearance.
sentences.chinese: 他老是批评妻子的外表。

sentences.english: We are often attracted to somebody first by their physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 我们经常先被一个人的外貌吸引。

sentences.english: Women, in general, tend to be more concerned than men about their personal appearance .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.english: She had an outward appearance of calm, but deep down she was really worried.
sentences.chinese: 她表面上很镇静，内心却十分担忧。

sentences.english: The metal posts spoiled the appearance of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 金属柱子破坏了花园的外观。

sentences.english: A garnish helps to enhance the appearance of any dish.
sentences.chinese: 装饰菜能为任何菜肴增色。

sentences.english: She’s the kind of woman who takes pride in her appearance .
sentences.chinese: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t judge by appearances .
sentences.chinese: 你不该以貌取人。

sentences.english: They work hard at school without giving the appearance of being particularly hard-working.
sentences.chinese: 他们在学校里学习很用功，只是表面上并不显得特别如此。

sentences.english: The case had all the appearances of a straightforward murder.
sentences.chinese: 从所有迹象来看，这个案件都像一宗简单的谋杀。

sentences.english: The pupils looked angelic – but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.chinese: 这些学生看上去如天使一般，但外表可能是会骗人的。

sentences.english: He was, to all appearances , a respectable, successful businessman.
sentences.chinese: 从各方面看，他都是个体面而成功的商人。

sentences.english: The industry has changed greatly with the appearance of new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 新技术问世后，这一行业出现了天翻地覆的变化。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone or something looks to other people

sentences.english: She has reason to feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.english: the human power of reason
sentences.chinese: 人类的理性

sentences.english: They reasoned that other businesses would soon copy the idea.
sentences.chinese: 他们推断其他企业也会很快仿效这个点子。

detailed_translations.english: why something happens, or why someone does something
to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts

sentences.english: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.chinese: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.english: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.english: to discover whether something is correct or true

name: package
trans: 包，包裹；套装软件，[计] 程序包

sentences.english: There’s a package here for a Miami Lakes address.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个寄往迈阿密湖的包裹。

detailed_translations.english: something wrapped in paper, packed in a box, and then sent by mail or delivered
to put food or other goods into a bag, box etc ready to be sold or sent

name: involve
trans: 包含；牵涉；使陷于；潜心于

sentences.english: What will the job involve?
sentences.chinese: 这份工作包括什么？

sentences.english: I didn’t realize putting on a play involved so much work.
sentences.chinese: 我没想到上演一出戏剧需要做这么多的工作。

detailed_translations.english: if an activity or situation involves something, that thing is part of it or a result of it

sentences.english: The woman took out her chequebook and quickly made out four cheques.
sentences.chinese: 那个女人拿出支票簿迅速开了4张支票。

detailed_translations.english: a small book of cheques that your bank gives you

name: highlight
trans: 最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；加亮区

sentences.english: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.english: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
sentences.chinese: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

detailed_translations.english: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition

sentences.english: Hundreds of small businesses went into liquidation (= were closed ).
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的小公司破产了。

detailed_translations.english: the act of closing a company by selling the things that belong to it, in order to pay its debts

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

name: overhead
trans: 在头顶上；在空中；在高处
高架的；在头上的；在头顶上的
天花板；[会计] 经常费用；间接费用；吊脚架空层

sentences.english: Bullets whizzed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 子弹嗖嗖地掠过头顶。

sentences.english: A plane flew overhead.
sentences.chinese: 一架飞机从头顶飞过。

sentences.english: She turned on the overhead light and looked around the little room.
sentences.chinese: 她打开顶灯，环视这间小屋。

detailed_translations.english: above your head or in the sky
You use overhead to indicate that something is above you or above the place that you are talking about

detailed_translations.chinese: 经常费用， 管理费用
detailed_translations.english: money spent regularly on rent, insurance, electricity, and other things that are needed to keep a business operating

sentences.english: Each character requires one byte of storage space.
sentences.chinese: 每个字符需要一个字节的储存空间。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring computer information, equal to eight  bit s (=  the smallest unit on which information is stored on a computer  )

name: respond
trans: 回答；作出反应；承担责任

sentences.english: They are likely to respond positively to the president's request for aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们有可能积极地回应该总统的援助请求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回答， 答复； 作出反应， 响应
detailed_translations.english: to do something as a reaction to something that has been said or done

sentences.english: Recent inflation could nullify the economic growth of the last several years.
sentences.chinese: 最近的通货膨胀可能会抵消过去数年的经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: to make something lose its effect or value

sentences.english: We learned all the tricks of privatization.
sentences.chinese: 我们学到了私有化的所有技巧。

sentences.english: The household contract responsibility system does not mean privatization of the rural economy.
sentences.chinese: 家庭联产承包制并不意味着农村经济私有化。

sentences.english: Outside the World Water Forum, hundreds of protesters demonstrated against what they call the "privatization" of water.
sentences.chinese: 在世界水论坛的会场外面，数百名抗议者举行示威，反对他们所说的“水资源私有化”。

detailed_translations.english: the act of privatizing something

name: refresh
trans: 更新；使……恢复；使……清新；消除……的疲劳

sentences.english: A shower will refresh you.
sentences.chinese: 洗个淋浴你就凉快了。

sentences.english: He refreshed himself with a glass of iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 他喝了杯冰茶提了提神。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel less tired or less hot

sentences.english: The morning paper carried a story about demonstrations in New York and Washington D.C.
sentences.chinese: 晨报登载了纽约和华盛顿特区举行示威游行的报道。

sentences.english: The national TV network carries religious programmes.
sentences.chinese: 全国电视网播出宗教节目。

detailed_translations.english: if a newspaper, a television or radio broadcast, or a website carries a piece of news, an advertisement etc, it prints it or broadcasts it

name: listed
trans: 列出的；表列的；已登录的

sentences.english: Check if all the configurations listed above have been performed.
sentences.chinese: 检查是否执行了上面列出的所有配置。

sentences.english: Select any one of the listed files to open and edit it in the respective editor.
sentences.chinese: 选择任意一个列出的文件，以在各自的编辑器中打开并编辑它。

sentences.english: The relationships I have and that I consider to be meaningful have all of the qualities listed above.
sentences.chinese: 我拥有的人脉，其中我认为有意义的关系包含上述列出的所有品质。

detailed_translations.english: a listed company is one which offers its shares for sale on the stock exchange

name: orientation
trans: 方向；定向；适应；情况介绍；向东方

sentences.english: The company needs to develop a stronger orientation towards marketing its products.
sentences.chinese: 公司需要针对其产品的营销设定一个更为明确的目标。

sentences.english: How can we get students to adopt a serious orientation to learning?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎样才能让学生对学习采取认真的态度呢？

detailed_translations.english: the type of activity or subject that a person or organization seems most interested in and gives most attention to

sentences.english: Smoking is banned in the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼内禁止吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something must not be done, seen, used etc
an official order that prevents something from being used or done

sentences.english: He was transferred for a fee of £8 million.
sentences.chinese: 他以800万英镑的转会费转到了其他球队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搬， 转移； 调动， 转学； 转让， 过户； 乘车， 转乘
detailed_translations.english: to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization

name: luminary
trans: 发光体；杰出人物；知识渊博的人

sentences.english: luminaries of Parisian society
sentences.chinese: 巴黎社会的名流

detailed_translations.chinese: 发光体；杰出人物；知识渊博的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who is very famous or highly respected for their skill at doing something or their knowledge of a particular subject

sentences.english: Burglars broke into their home.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼闯进了他们家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes into houses, shops etc to steal things

name: hold
trans: 持有；拥有；保存；拘留；约束或控制

sentences.english: She was holding a large box.
sentences.chinese: 她提着一只大箱子。

sentences.english: I held the mouse by its tail.
sentences.chinese: 我抓着耗子的尾巴倒提起来。

sentences.english: Employees hold 30% of the shares.
sentences.chinese: 雇员持有30%的股份。

detailed_translations.english: to carry sth; to have sb/sth in your hand, arms, etc.

name: career
trans: 生涯；职业；事业；速度，全速

sentences.english: a teaching career
sentences.chinese: 教学事业

sentences.english: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.chinese: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.english: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.chinese: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.english: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.chinese: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

detailed_translations.english: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes

sentences.english: He has offended the party's traditional base by pandering to the rich and the middle classes.
sentences.chinese: 他迎合富人和中产阶级，触犯了该党的传统基础。

detailed_translations.english: If you pander to someone or to their wishes, you do everything that they want, often to get some advantage for yourself

sentences.english: a distribution centre
sentences.chinese: 经销中心

detailed_translations.english: the act of sharing things among a large group of people in a planned way

name: flagship
trans: 旗舰；（作定语）一流；佼佼者

sentences.english: the flagship of the new Ford range
sentences.chinese: 新款福特汽车系列中的旗舰产品

detailed_translations.chinese: 旗舰；（作定语）一流；佼佼者
detailed_translations.english: the most important ship in a group of ships belonging to the navy

name: sensible
trans: 明智的; 通情达理的; 合乎情理的; 意识到的，能感觉到的;
可感觉到的东西; 敏感的人;

sentences.english: She seems very sensible.
sentences.chinese: 她好像很明智。

sentences.english: sensible advice
sentences.chinese: 合理的建议

sentences.english: It’s sensible to keep a note of your passport number.
sentences.chinese: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.english: Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

detailed_translations.english: reasonable, practical, and showing good judgment

sentences.english: It was a major accomplishment for a player who had been injured so recently.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个刚受过伤的选手来说，这是很好的成绩。

detailed_translations.english: something successful or impressive that is achieved after a lot of effort and hard work

name: damages
trans: 伤害；毁坏（damage的第三人称单数）

sentences.english: Incidents of this type cause irreparable damage to relations with the community.
sentences.chinese: 此类事件对与该团体的关系造成不可挽回的伤害。

sentences.english: ...the electoral chaos that damaged Florida's reputation.
sentences.chinese: …损害佛罗里达州声誉的选举骚乱。

detailed_translations.english: Damage consists of the unpleasant effects that something has on a person, situation, or type of activity

detailed_translations.chinese: 伤害；毁坏（damage的第三人称单数）
detailed_translations.english: To damage something means to cause it to become less good, pleasant, or successful

name: horizontal
trans: 水平的；地平线的；同一阶层的
水平线，水平面；水平位置

sentences.english: a horizontal surface
sentences.chinese: 水平面

detailed_translations.chinese: 水平的；地平线的；同一阶层的
detailed_translations.english: flat and level

detailed_translations.chinese: 水平线，水平面；水平位置
detailed_translations.english: a horizontal line or surface

name: will
trans: 意志；决心；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

name: pledge
trans: 保证，誓言；抵押；抵押品，典当物
保证，许诺；用……抵押；举杯祝……健康

sentences.english: The meeting ended with a pledge to step up cooperation between the six states of the region.
sentences.chinese: 会议以加快该地区6个州之间合作的承诺结束。

detailed_translations.english: a serious promise or agree-ment, especially one made publicly or officially
to make a formal, usually public, promise that you will do something

name: inflation
trans: 膨胀；通货膨胀；夸张；自命不凡

sentences.english: Inflation is now at over 16%.
sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀率现已超过16%。

detailed_translations.english: a continuing increase in prices, or the rate at which prices increase

sentences.english: The public bar was crowded.
sentences.chinese: 大众酒吧间里人很多。

sentences.english: a candy bar
sentences.chinese: 一根糖果棒

sentences.english: houses with bars across the windows
sentences.chinese: 窗户上钉有铁条的房屋

detailed_translations.english: one of the rooms inside a pub

sentences.english: the government’s promise to compensate victims of the flood
sentences.chinese: 政府对水灾灾民给予补偿的许诺

sentences.english: The firm will compensate workers for their loss of earnings.
sentences.chinese: 公司将补偿工人的收入损失。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone money because they have suffered injury, loss, or damage

name: home
trans: 家，住宅；产地；家乡；避难所

sentences.english: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.english: Good luck in your new home!
sentences.chinese: 祝你在新家一切顺利！

sentences.english: A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.english: the house, apartment, or place where you live
relating to or belonging to your home or family

name: binder
trans: [胶粘] 粘合剂；活页夹；装订工；捆缚者；用以绑缚之物

detailed_translations.chinese: [胶粘] 粘合剂；活页夹；装订工；捆缚者；用以绑缚之物
detailed_translations.english: a removable cover for holding loose sheets of paper, magazines etc

name: supermarket
trans: 超级市场；自助售货商店

sentences.english: His eyes roved round the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.english: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.chinese: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.english: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

detailed_translations.english: a very large shop that sells food, drinks, and things that people need regularly in their homes

name: accident
trans: 事故；意外；[法] 意外事件；机遇

sentences.english: Ken had an accident at work and had to go to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 肯在工作中出了事故，不得不去医院。

sentences.english: I had a slight accident with your coffee.
sentences.chinese: 出了个小小的意外，我把你的咖啡弄洒了。

sentences.english: a train accident
sentences.chinese: 火车事故

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which someone is injured or something is damaged without anyone intending them to be

sentences.english: All visitors to the apartment building must be announced.
sentences.chinese: 那幢公寓楼的访客都必须通报。

sentences.english: After announcing himself at the reception desk, James was led upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 在接待处通报姓名后，詹姆斯被领上楼去。

detailed_translations.english: to officially tell people that someone has arrived at a particular place

sentences.english: the Roman empire
sentences.chinese: 罗马帝国

detailed_translations.english: a group of countries that are all controlled by one ruler or government

name: savings
trans: 储蓄；存款；救助；节省物（saving的复数形式）

sentences.english: You can enjoy a year's membership for just $28 – a saving of $7 off the regular rate.
sentences.chinese: 你只需花$28就可以享受一年的会员资格–比正常会费节省了$7。

detailed_translations.chinese: 储蓄；存款；救助；节省物（saving的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: A saving is a reduction in the amount of time or money that is used or needed

sentences.english: He quit his job after an argument with a colleague.
sentences.chinese: 他和一个同事争吵后就辞职了。

sentences.english: I quit school at 16.
sentences.chinese: 我十六岁辍学。

sentences.english: She has decided to quit show business.
sentences.chinese: 她已决定退出娱乐圈。

sentences.english: People are now calling on the chairman to quit.
sentences.chinese: 人们现在正要求主席辞职。

sentences.english: I've quit smoking.
sentences.chinese: 我戒了烟。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a job, school etc, especially without finishing it completely

sentences.english: Computer games can improve children’s manual dexterity .
sentences.chinese: 电脑游戏可以提高儿童手的灵活性。

detailed_translations.english: skill and speed in doing something with your hands

sentences.english: I think that containerization is one of the best transportation methods at present.
sentences.chinese: 我认为是集装箱化是当前的最佳运输方法这一。

sentences.english: Of course the shipment of goods has been changed by the technique of containerization.
sentences.chinese: 当然货物装运随集装箱运输技术而改变。

sentences.english: The growth of containerization has resulted in changes in transport patterns and practices.
sentences.chinese: 集装箱化的增长导致了运输方式和实际惯例的改变。

name: cruel
trans: 残酷的，残忍的；使人痛苦的，让人受难的；无情的，严酷的

sentences.english: His death was a cruel blow .
sentences.chinese: 他的死是个无情的打击。

sentences.english: Sometimes life seems unbearably cruel.
sentences.chinese: 有时候生活残酷得让人无法承受。

detailed_translations.chinese: 残酷的，残忍的；使人痛苦的，让人受难的；无情的，严酷的
detailed_translations.english: making someone suffer or feel unhappy

name: clear
trans: 清楚的；清澈的；晴朗的；无罪的

sentences.english: clear instructions
sentences.chinese: 明确的指示

sentences.english: The question wasn’t very clear.
sentences.chinese: 这问题不是很清楚。

sentences.english: It’s the clearest guide I’ve used.
sentences.chinese: 我从没用过这么清晰易懂的指南。

sentences.english: Perhaps I tried to cover too much and didn’t make myself clear (= express myself well ) .
sentences.chinese: 可能是我涉及的内容太多，没有表达清楚。

sentences.english: If you don’t understand, it’s best to say so and get things clear .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不明白，那就最好照直说并把事情弄清楚。

sentences.english: If I catch you smoking again, you’re grounded. Do I make myself clear (= used when you are angry ) ?
sentences.chinese: 如果再让我发现你抽烟，我就罚你不准出门。我的话你听清楚了吗？

sentences.english: Snowplows have been out clearing the roads.
sentences.chinese: 扫雪机已经出动，去清扫路面了。

detailed_translations.english: expressed in a simple and direct way so that people understand
to make somewhere emptier or tidier by removing things from it

name: subscribe
trans: 订阅；捐款；认购；赞成；签署

sentences.english: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.chinese: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

sentences.english: Each employee may subscribe for up to £2,000 worth of shares.
sentences.chinese: 每位员工最高可以认购价值 2,000 英镑的股份。

sentences.english: The tour of Edinburgh is fully subscribed.
sentences.chinese: 去爱丁堡旅游的名额已经满了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

sentences.english: Are your hands clean?
sentences.chinese: 你的手干净吗？

sentences.english: clean towels
sentences.chinese: 干净的毛巾

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the wound clean .
sentences.chinese: 一定要保持伤口清洁。

sentences.english: Wipe that sink clean when you’re done.
sentences.chinese: 洗完后将水槽擦干净。

sentences.english: As usual, she left her room clean and tidy before going to school.
sentences.chinese: 和往常一样，她去上学之前把房间收拾得干干净净。

sentences.english: a spotlessly clean kitchen
sentences.chinese: 一尘不染的厨房

sentences.english: Oh, don’t get mad - it’s just good clean fun !
sentences.chinese: 噢，不要生气——这不过是个正经的玩笑嘛！

detailed_translations.english: without any dirt, marks etc

sentences.english: As well as this, the movie is an intriguing, if slightly loaded new perspective on the abdication crisis of 1936.
sentences.chinese: 除此以外，如果顺带着赋予1936年退位危机的新视角，这部电影也是很有趣的。

sentences.english: But even after his abdication, he remained the effective ruler of China until his death four years later at the age of 88.
sentences.chinese: 即使在退位后，他仍然手握大权，直到四年后以88岁的高龄去世，一代王朝才正式落下帷幕。

sentences.english: the company’s distribution depot
sentences.chinese: 公司的发货仓库

sentences.english: a fuel storage depot
sentences.chinese: 燃料储存仓库

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are stored until they are needed

name: probability
trans: 可能性；机率；[数] 或然率

sentences.english: You must decide whether, on the balance of probabilities , he committed the crime.
sentences.chinese: 你们一定要权衡正反两方面的可能性，然后再裁定他是否犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: how likely something is, sometimes calculated in a mathematical way

sentences.english: a rigid social hierarchy
sentences.chinese: 严格的社会等级制度

sentences.english: She worked her way up through the corporate hierarchy to become president.
sentences.chinese: 她在公司一步一步升到了总裁的位置。

detailed_translations.english: a system of organization in which people or things are divided into levels of importance

sentences.english: an airline pilot
sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

detailed_translations.english: a company that takes passengers and goods to different places by plane

sentences.english: If there is no warning for one within half an year, the punishment of warning can be revocable;
sentences.chinese: 半年内无再犯警告处罚，表现良好的员工可撤销其警告处分。

sentences.english: If one is well behaved and has made great contributions to company as well within one year, the demerit recording can be revocable;
sentences.chinese: 一年内表现良好且为公司作出重大贡献的可撤销一次记过。

detailed_translations.english: capable of being revoked; able to be cancelled

name: productivity
trans: 生产力；生产率；生产能力

sentences.english: high productivity levels in manufacturing
sentences.chinese: 制造业中的高生产率

sentences.english: It cost the country $4 million in lost productivity .
sentences.chinese: 它对该国造成了400万美元的生产力损失。

detailed_translations.english: the rate at which goods are produced, and the amount produced, especially in relation to the work, time, and money needed to produce them

sentences.english: ...the cultural diversity of Latin America.
sentences.chinese: …拉丁美洲文化的多样性。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of including many different types of people or things

sentences.english: For these reasons, the bank chose it as their development tool for their modernization project.
sentences.chinese: 出于这些理由，银行选择它作为其现代化项目的开发工具。

sentences.english: We must achieve modernization of science and technology, otherwise we will lag behind other nations.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须实现科学技术现代化，否则我们要落后于其他国家。

sentences.english: a dozen eggs
sentences.chinese: 一打鸡蛋

sentences.english: Chris, Helen, and half a dozen others went on holiday together.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯、海伦和其他六个人一起去度假了。

sentences.english: (= about 12 ) cars were parked near the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 入口附近停了大约十二辆汽车。

detailed_translations.english: twelve

sentences.english: The bright modern painting stares out at you in the otherwise conservative gallery.
sentences.chinese: 有些古典派画廊也会陈列出明亮色彩的现代派绘画。

sentences.english: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.chinese: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.english: Whether you just want to browse our huge image gallery or want to share your personal photos with others, this is the site for you!
sentences.chinese: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

detailed_translations.english: a small privately owned shop or studio where you can see and buy pieces of art

name: vendor
trans: 卖主；小贩；供应商；[贸易] 自动售货机

sentences.english: the shouts of street vendors
sentences.chinese: 街头小贩的吆喝声

detailed_translations.chinese: 卖主；小贩；供应商；[贸易] 自动售货机
detailed_translations.english: someone who sells things, especially on the street

sentences.english: They put an advertisement in ‘The Morning News’, offering a high salary for the right person.
sentences.chinese: 他们在《晨报》上刊登了一则启事，出高薪寻找合适的人选。

sentences.english: The organizers of the concert had taken out a full page advertisement in ‘The New York Times’.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会筹办者在《纽约时报》上刊登了整版广告。

sentences.english: Only a handful of people answered the advertisement .
sentences.chinese: 只有寥寥数人对该广告作出了回应。

detailed_translations.english: a picture, set of words, or a short film, which is intended to persuade people to buy a product or use a service, or that gives information about a job that is available, an event that is going to happen etc

sentences.english: Working hours must not exceed 42 hours a week.
sentences.chinese: 工作时间每周不得超过42小时。

sentences.english: His performance exceeded our expectations.
sentences.chinese: 他的表现出乎我们的预料。

sentences.english: The riot police had exceeded their authority.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察超越了他们的权限。

detailed_translations.chinese: 超过,胜过；越出 (限制、规定)
detailed_translations.english: to be more than a particular number or amount

sentences.english: Her eyes were void of all expression.
sentences.chinese: 她的眼神一片茫然。

detailed_translations.english: a contract or official agreement that is void is not legal and has no effect

detailed_translations.chinese: 空虚感，寂寞感；真空，空白
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great sadness that you have when someone you love dies or when something is taken from you
to make a contract or agreement void so that it has no legal effect

name: amenity
trans: 舒适；礼仪；愉快；便利设施

sentences.english: The hotel is in the city centre, close to shops and local amenities.
sentences.chinese: 该酒店位于市中心，紧邻商店和当地的便利设施。

sentences.english: houses that lack basic amenities
sentences.chinese: 缺乏基本生活设施的房屋

detailed_translations.chinese: 舒适；礼仪；愉快；便利设施
detailed_translations.english: something that makes a place comfortable or easy to live in

name: lottery

name: underpin
trans: 巩固；支持；从下面支撑；加强…的基础

sentences.english: the theories that underpin his teaching method
sentences.chinese: 支持他的教学方法的理论

sentences.english: America’s wealth is underpinned by a global system which exploits the world’s poor.
sentences.chinese: 美国的财富是靠一个剥削全世界穷人的全球体系来支撑的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巩固；支持；从下面支撑；加强…的基础
detailed_translations.english: to give strength or support to something and to help it succeed

sentences.english: the UK distributorship for Sol lighting products
sentences.chinese: Sol牌照明产品的英国分销商

detailed_translations.english: a company that has an arrangement to sell the products of another company

name: panel
trans: 仪表板；嵌板；座谈小组，全体陪审员

sentences.english: A panel of experts has looked at the proposal.
sentences.chinese: 一组专家审核了那项提议。

sentences.english: There will be at least three senior doctors on the panel.
sentences.chinese: 专家小组中至少有三名资深医生。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people with skills or specialist knowledge who have been chosen to give advice or opinions on a particular subject

sentences.english: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.chinese: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.english: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.chinese: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 探险， 探索； 仔细查阅， 探究
detailed_translations.english: to discuss or think about something carefully

name: motivate
trans: 刺激；使有动机；激发…的积极性

sentences.english: A good teacher has to be able to motivate her students.
sentences.chinese: 好教师必须能够激发学生的积极性。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone want to achieve something and make them willing to work hard in order to do this

sentences.english: officials appointed by the government
sentences.chinese: 政府任命的官员

sentences.english: The committee appointed a day in June for celebrations.
sentences.chinese: 委员会把庆典定在6月的一天举行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 任命，委派；约定，确定，指定
detailed_translations.english: to choose someone for a position or a job

name: goods
trans: 商品；动产；合意的人；真本领

sentences.english: a goods train
sentences.chinese: 一列货车

sentences.english: the large market for consumer goods
sentences.chinese: 庞大的消费品市场

sentences.english: Britain’s leading exporter of manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 英国主要的工业制成品出口商

sentences.english: There will be tax increases on a range of goods and services .
sentences.chinese: 有一些商品和服务将要增税。

detailed_translations.english: things which are carried by road, train etc

name: quick
trans: 快的；迅速的，敏捷的；灵敏的

sentences.english: That was quick! I thought you’d be another hour.
sentences.chinese: 很快啊！我以为你还要一个小时呢。

sentences.english: It’s probably quicker by train.
sentences.chinese: 乘火车可能会快一点。

sentences.english: Have we got time for a quick drink?
sentences.chinese: 我们有时间喝口东西吗？

sentences.english: What’s the quickest way to the station?
sentences.chinese: 到车站怎么走最快？

sentences.english: We stopped to have a quick look at the church.
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来迅速地扫了一眼教堂。

sentences.english: Three bombs went off in quick succession (= quickly, one after the other ).
sentences.chinese: 瞬间有三个炸弹连续爆炸。

detailed_translations.english: lasting for or taking only a short time

name: reassessment
trans: 重新评估；[经] 重新估价；重新考虑

sentences.english: There's a total reassessment of what people want out of life.
sentences.chinese: 对于人们对生活有什么样的期待有了重新评价。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重新评估；[经] 重新估价；重新考虑
detailed_translations.english: If you make a reassessment of something, you think about it and decide whether you need to change your opinion about it

name: receivership
trans: [经管] 破产管理；破产管理人的职务；破产在管

sentences.english: The company went into receivership with massive debts.
sentences.chinese: 该公司负债累累，已经由破产管理人接管。

detailed_translations.chinese: [经管] 破产管理；破产管理人的职务；破产在管
detailed_translations.english: if a business is in receivership, it is controlled by an official receiver because it has no money

name: gimmick
trans: 暗机关；骗人的玩意；花招
使暗机关；搞骗人的玩意

sentences.english: advertising gimmicks
sentences.chinese: 广告把戏

detailed_translations.chinese: 暗机关；骗人的玩意；花招
detailed_translations.english: a trick or something unusual that you do to make people notice someone or something – used to show disapproval

detailed_translations.chinese: 使暗机关；搞骗人的玩意

sentences.english: They run races; they wrestle; and sometimes they have mock fights together.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁参加各种赛跑，摔跤，有时还在一起模拟战斗。

detailed_translations.english: to fight someone by holding them and pulling or pushing them

name: judicial
trans: 公正的，明断的；法庭的；审判上的

sentences.english: ...an independent judicial system.
sentences.chinese: …一个独立的司法体系。

sentences.english: ...efforts to manipulate the judicial process.
sentences.chinese: …操纵审判程序的努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 公正的，明断的；法庭的；审判上的
detailed_translations.english: Judicial means relating to the legal system and to judgments made in a court of law

sentences.english: Sometimes you have to sacrifice efficiency for effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 有时候你需要牺牲效率来达到效果。

sentences.english: However, its viability and effectiveness still have to be established.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它的有效性和可行性尚有待验证。

sentences.english: So, how do you manage and measure the effectiveness of your IT governance solution for your business?
sentences.chinese: 那么，您如何管理并度量面向您的企业的 IT 治理解决方案的有效性呢？

sentences.english: ‘I’m a prisoner in my own home.’ ‘Nonsense!’
sentences.chinese: “我在自己家里就像个囚犯。”“胡说！”

sentences.english: If you ask me, these modern teaching methods are a load of nonsense (= a lot of nonsense ).
sentences.chinese: 要我说，这些现代教学方法全是一派胡言。

sentences.english: He was talking utter nonsense as usual.
sentences.chinese: 他像平常一样又在胡说八道了。

sentences.english: By 1832 the idea had become an economic nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 到了1832年，那种观点已经成为经济学的谬论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 胡说， 废话； 冒失的行动
detailed_translations.english: ideas, opinions, statements etc that are not true or that seem very stupid

name: seal
trans: 密封；印章；海豹；封条；标志

sentences.english: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.chinese: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.english: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.english: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that has a special design and shows the legal or official authority of a person or organization
to close an entrance or a container with something that stops air, water etc from coming in or out of it

sentences.english: We need to do a proper quantitative analysis of this problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要对这个问题作一个正确的定量分析。

detailed_translations.english: relating to amounts rather than to the quality or standard of something

sentences.english: a subordinate officer
sentences.chinese: 下级官员

detailed_translations.chinese: 下级的，级别低的；次要的，从属的
detailed_translations.english: in a less important position than someone else
someone who has a lower position and less authority than someone else in an organization

detailed_translations.chinese: 使处于次要地位， 使从属于
detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something in a less important position

sentences.english: the person who places the highest bid
sentences.chinese: 出价最高的人

sentences.english: We’ve made a bid of nearly £400 million for the company.
sentences.chinese: 我们出价近四亿英镑收购那家公司。

sentences.english: A takeover bid for the airline was launched today.
sentences.chinese: 今天有人出价收购该航空公司。

sentences.english: She bid £100 for a Victorian chair.
sentences.chinese: 她出价100英镑买一把维多利亚时代的椅子。

sentences.english: The two men ended up bidding against each other at the auction.
sentences.chinese: 结果那两个人在拍卖会上较起劲来。

detailed_translations.english: an offer to pay a particular price for something, especially at an  auction
to offer to pay a particular price for goods, especially in an auction

name: decentralization
trans: 分散；非集权化；（人口、工业等的）疏散

sentences.english: The decentralization of power appeals to individualism and libertarian humanism.
sentences.chinese: 分散权力迎合自由放任主义和自由人道主义。

detailed_translations.chinese: 权力下放； 分散经营； 分权

sentences.english: We must encourage innovation if the company is to remain competitive.
sentences.chinese: 公司要想保持竞争力，就必须鼓励革新。

sentences.english: recent innovations in English teaching
sentences.chinese: 英语教学的新创举

detailed_translations.english: the introduction of new ideas or methods

sentences.english: a leaflet on skin cancer
sentences.chinese: 有关皮肤癌的宣传页

sentences.english: Students were handing out election leaflets at the station.
sentences.chinese: 学生在车站分发选举传单。

detailed_translations.english: a small book or piece of paper advertising something or giving information on a particular subject

sentences.english: advertising revenue
sentences.chinese: 广告收入

sentences.english: Strikes have cost £20 million in lost revenues .
sentences.chinese: 罢工造成的收入损失达到2,000万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: money that a business or organization receives over a period of time, especially from selling goods or services

name: visionary
trans: 空想家；梦想者；有眼力的人

sentences.english: Under his visionary leadership, the city prospered.
sentences.chinese: 在他富有远见的领导下，这座城市蓬勃发展。

detailed_translations.english: existing only in someone’s mind and unlikely to ever exist in the real world

detailed_translations.chinese: 空想家；梦想者；有眼力的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who has clear ideas and strong feelings about the way something should be in the future

sentences.english: The offices are on the top two floors of the building.
sentences.chinese: 办公室在大楼最高的两层。

sentences.english: a farmhouse and other farm buildings
sentences.chinese: 农舍以及其他的农场建筑

sentences.english: There is a limited supply of land for building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑用地供应有限。

detailed_translations.english: a structure such as a house, church, or factory, that has a roof and walls

sentences.english: The school trip has become an annual event.
sentences.chinese: 学校组织的旅行成了一年一度的活动。

detailed_translations.english: happening once a year

detailed_translations.chinese: 年报， 年鉴； 一年生的植物
detailed_translations.english: a plant that lives for one year or season

sentences.english: a monarch without political power
sentences.chinese: 没有政治权力的君主

sentences.english: He was a political prisoner (= one who was put in prison because he was thought to be harmful to the state) .
sentences.chinese: 他曾是个政治犯。

detailed_translations.english: connected with the state, government or public affairs

sentences.english: Sara had the task of preparing the agenda for meetings.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.english: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.english: He soon realized the scale of the task he had undertaken .
sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.english: They have the unenviable task of supervising the most dangerous prison in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.english: Volunteers had the thankless task of distributing campaign leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.english: Trying to bring up a small daughter on your own is no easy task .
sentences.chinese: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly

sentences.english: They had made an agreement that they would share the profits equally.
sentences.chinese: 他们达成协议，平分利润。

sentences.english: Would their discussion result in his agreement to visit his stepmother?
sentences.chinese: 他们商量后，他会不会同意去看望继母？

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement or promise to do something, made by two or more people, companies, organizations etc

name: embarrassed
trans: 使困窘；使局促不安（embarrass的过去分词形式）

sentences.english: Lori gets embarrassed if we ask her to sing.
sentences.chinese: 我们要是请洛丽唱歌，她就会难为情。

sentences.english: He looked embarrassed when I asked him where he’d been.
sentences.chinese: 我问他去了哪里，他显得很窘迫。

detailed_translations.english: feeling uncomfortable or nervous and worrying about what people think of you, for example because you have made a silly mistake, or because you have to talk or sing in public

sentences.english: The feedback will be used to modify the course for next year.
sentences.chinese: 这些反馈意见将用于修改明年的课程。

sentences.english: The regulations can only be modified by a special committee.
sentences.chinese: 这些法规只能由特别委员会来修改。

detailed_translations.english: to make small changes to something in order to improve it and make it more suitable or effective

name: impending
trans: 即将发生的；迫切的；悬挂的

sentences.english: On the morning of the expedition, I awoke with a feeling of impending disaster.
sentences.chinese: 远征出发的那天早上，我醒来就有一种大难临头的感觉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 即将发生的；迫切的；悬挂的
detailed_translations.english: an impending event or situation, especially an unpleasant one, is going to happen very soon

sentences.english: How well do you know your chopstick etiquette?
sentences.chinese: 对于这些关于筷子的礼仪，你知道多少呢？

sentences.english: My father progged the top of the loaves with a chopstick.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲用一只筷子戳刺面包的顶部

sentences.english: I put down my chopstick, the half eaten pork chop left cold on the plate.
sentences.chinese: 我放下我的筷子，被我吃了一半的排骨躺在盘子上变凉了。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two thin sticks that you use to eat food in many countries in Asia

sentences.english: Students are discovering the endless amount of information in cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 学生在网络空间里不断发现无穷尽的信息。

detailed_translations.english: all the connections between computers in different places, considered as a real place where information, messages, pictures etc exist

sentences.english: Student registration (= for a course of study ) starts the first week in September.
sentences.chinese: 学生注册在9月份的第一个星期开始。

sentences.english: The registration fee is $75.
sentences.chinese: 注册费是75美元。

detailed_translations.english: the act of recording names and details on an official list

name: provision
trans: 规定；条款；准备；[经] 供应品

sentences.english: The agreement includes a provision for each side to check the other side’s weapons.
sentences.chinese: 协议有项规定，允许双方互查武器。

sentences.english: Under the provisions of the Act, employers must supply safety equipment.
sentences.chinese: 该法令规定，雇主必须提供安全设备。

detailed_translations.english: a condition in an agreement or law

sentences.english: customer details held on a database
sentences.chinese: 存储在数据库内的客户详细信息

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of data stored in a computer system so that you can find and use it easily

name: illuminate
trans: 阐明，说明；照亮；使灿烂；用灯装饰

sentences.english: A single candle illuminated his face.
sentences.chinese: 一支蜡烛照亮了他的脸。

sentences.english: The report illuminated the difficult issues at the heart of science policy.
sentences.chinese: 报告阐明了科学方针核心部分的难点。

detailed_translations.english: to make a light shine on something, or to fill a place with light

name: election
trans: 选举；当选；选择权；上帝的选拔

sentences.english: The Labour Party won the 2001 election by a huge majority.
sentences.chinese: 工党在2001年选举中以巨大优势获胜。

sentences.english: Elections for the state governorship will be on November 25.
sentences.chinese: 州长选举将于11月25日举行。

detailed_translations.english: when people vote to choose someone for an official position

name: convenient
trans: 方便的；[废语]适当的；[口语]近便的；实用的

sentences.english: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
sentences.chinese: 使用邮购目录是一种方便的购物方式。

sentences.english: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会打电话给你安排一个方便的时间见面。

sentences.english: restaurants convenient for shops and theatres
sentences.chinese: 靠近商店和剧院的餐厅

detailed_translations.english: useful to you because it saves you time, or does not spoil your plans or cause you problems

sentences.english: His plan is to get a degree in economics and then work abroad for a year.
sentences.chinese: 他计划先取得经济学学位，然后去国外工作一年。

sentences.english: Do you have any plans for the weekend?
sentences.chinese: 你周末有什么打算？

sentences.english: He immediately began planning his escape.
sentences.chinese: 他立即开始计划逃跑。

sentences.english: The former president is planning a return to politics.
sentences.chinese: 前总统打算重返政坛。

detailed_translations.english: something you have decided to do
to think carefully about something you want to do, and decide how and when you will do it

name: hostel
trans: 旅社，招待所（尤指青年旅社）

sentences.english: The 260-bed hostel on Second Street, just two blocks from the beach, had come highly recommended by an Angeleno I’d met on a recent trip to the Caribbean.
sentences.chinese: 这家有260张床位的招待所离海滩只有两个街区，是我在最近一次去加勒比海的旅途上遇见的一个洛杉矶人极力推荐的。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people can stay and eat fairly cheaply

name: weighting
trans: 加重，加权；衡量；（英）生活补贴

sentences.english: salary £24,000 plus £2,400 London weighting
sentences.chinese: 2.4万英镑工资，外加2,400英镑伦敦生活补贴

detailed_translations.chinese: 加重，加权；衡量；（英）生活补贴
detailed_translations.english: additional money that you get paid because of the high cost of living in a particular area

name: competitive
trans: 竞争的；比赛的；求胜心切的

sentences.english: Competitive sports encourage children to work together as a team.
sentences.chinese: 竞技体育鼓励孩子们进行团队协作。

sentences.english: Advertising is an intensely competitive business.
sentences.chinese: 广告业是一个竞争激烈的行业。

detailed_translations.english: relating to competition

name: crossroads
trans: 十字路口；交叉路口；聚会的中心地点（crossroad的复数形式）

sentences.english: The car was approaching the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 汽车正驶近交叉路口。

detailed_translations.chinese: 十字路口；交叉路口；聚会的中心地点（crossroad的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: a place where two roads meet and cross each other

sentences.english: By changing the tomato’s genetic blueprint , scientists can alter the rate at which it ripens.
sentences.chinese: 科学家可以通过改变番茄的基因蓝图来改变它的成熟速度。

detailed_translations.english: a plan for achieving something

name: earn
trans: 赚，赚得；获得，挣得；使得到；博得

sentences.english: He earns nearly £20,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 他每年挣近20,000英镑。

sentences.english: You don’t earn much money being a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 当护士挣钱并不多。

sentences.english: He did all sorts of jobs to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 他为谋生什么活都干。

sentences.english: I was the only person in the house who was earning.
sentences.chinese: 我是家里唯一上班挣钱的人。

sentences.english: She was earning good money at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 她在银行工作，收入不错。

sentences.english: You could earn a higher rate of interest elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 你在别处可以获得更高的利率。

detailed_translations.english: to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do

name: overestimate
trans: 对……评价过高；对……估计过高
估计过高；评价过高；出价过高

sentences.english: He tends to overestimate his own abilities.
sentences.chinese: 他往往高估自己的能力。

sentences.english: The importance of training in health and safety cannot be overestimated (= is extremely important ).
sentences.chinese: 对健康和安全方面的培训极为重要。

detailed_translations.english: to think something is better, more important etc than it really is

name: characteristic
trans: 典型的；特有的；表示特性的

sentences.english: the highly characteristic (= very typical ) flint walls of the local houses
sentences.chinese: 当地房子非常有特色的燧石墙

sentences.english: Violent images are a defining characteristic of his work.
sentences.chinese: 暴力形象是他作品的一个鲜明特征。

detailed_translations.english: very typical of a particular thing or of someone’s character
a quality or feature of something or someone that is typical of them and easy to recognize

name: consistent
trans: 始终如一的，一致的；坚持的

trans: 衰退（经济方面）；低迷时期

sentences.english: Chinese civilization is the only one without interruption.
sentences.chinese: 中华文明是唯一没有中断的文明。

trans: 补充；聘用；征募；使…恢复健康

sentences.english: We’re having difficulty recruiting enough qualified staff.
sentences.chinese: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。

name: tenant
trans: 承租人；房客；佃户；居住者

trans: 兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行
使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与

trans: 采取；接受；收养；正式通过

sentences.chinese: 我们沿着福莱福特路行驶。

sentences.chinese: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

sentences.chinese: 这小男孩不肯服从。

sentences.chinese: 她想跑，但沉重的旅行箱拖累了她。

sentences.chinese: 诺玛·琼斯在本地一家化工厂作包装工。

sentences.english: We’ve spent a lot on the children’s education.
sentences.chinese: 我们在孩子的教育上花费甚多。

name: TT

detailed_translations.chinese: 电汇（Telegraphic Transfer）；总时间（Total Time）；技术术语（Technical Term）；经结核菌素试验的（Tuberculin Tested）

name: graphic
trans: 形象的；图表的；绘画似的

sentences.english: ...fine and graphic arts.
