detailed_translations.english: rules or instructions about the best way to do something

sentences.english: We’re focussing too much on irrelevant details.
sentences.chinese: 我们过于关注不相干的细节。

sentences.english: Students viewed Latin as boring and irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 学生认为拉丁语无聊且无关紧要。

detailed_translations.english: not useful or not relating to a particular situation, and therefore not important

name: difficult
trans: 困难的；不随和的；执拗的

sentences.english: a difficult question
sentences.chinese: 难解的问题

sentences.english: an immensely difficult task
sentences.chinese: 极为艰巨的任务

sentences.english: Was the exam very difficult?
sentences.chinese: 这次考试很难吗？

sentences.english: It’s difficult to see how more savings can be made.
sentences.chinese: 想要进一步节约看来是很难了。

sentences.english: Don’t be so difficult!
sentences.chinese: 别这么挑剔！

detailed_translations.english: hard to do, understand, or deal with

sentences.english: The cancer has gone into remission .
sentences.chinese: 癌症已经开始好转。

detailed_translations.english: a period when a serious illness improves for a time

sentences.english: a city of six million inhabitants
sentences.chinese: 有600万居民的城市

detailed_translations.english: one of the people who live in a particular place

sentences.english: a consortium of oil companies
sentences.chinese: 石油公司联合企业

sentences.english: The aircraft will be built by a European consortium.
sentences.chinese: 这种飞机将由欧洲的一个财团建造。

detailed_translations.english: a group of companies or organizations who are working together to do something

sentences.english: ...a self-made Irish-American property tycoon.
sentences.chinese: …一个靠自己奋斗成功的爱尔兰裔美国房地产大亨。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is successful in business or industry and has a lot of money and power

sentences.english: the menswear department
sentences.chinese: 男装部

detailed_translations.english: clothing for men – used especially in shops

sentences.english: The first edition was published in 1765.
sentences.chinese: 第一版于1765年出版。

sentences.english: They are publishing the dictionary on CD-ROM.
sentences.chinese: 那部词典他们将以光盘版的形式推出。

sentences.english: We love reading your letters and we try to publish as many as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢阅读大家的来信，并且会尽量刊登出来。

sentences.english: The latest unemployment figures will be published tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 最新的失业数字将于明天公布。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a book, magazine etc to be written, printed, and sold

sentences.english: No special license will be regranted to anyone from now on.
sentences.chinese: 特殊许可证今后不得向任何人再行发放。

sentences.english: Remind me to renew the driver's license.It will lapse next month.
sentences.chinese: 提醒我更换驾驶执照，它下个月就失效了。

sentences.english: The next time the client connects to the server, it will obtain another license.
sentences.chinese: 在客户端下一次连接到服务器时，它将获得另一个许可证。

detailed_translations.english: to give official permission for someone to do or produce something, or for an activity to take place

sentences.english: At present, the fundamental problems of Chinas antidumping legislation lie in the conservative legislative concept and the backward legislative technology.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我国反倾销立法存在的根本问题是立法观念的保守和立法技术的滞后。

sentences.english: The principle of public interest review has been established by the recent amendment to Chinas antidumping legislation, but there is not clear provisions about the review procedures.
sentences.chinese: 我国反倾销立法新近的修改确立了公共利益审查原则，但是，没有明确规定公共利益审查的具体程序。

sentences.english: Antidumping have become the important obstacle in the process of Chinese firms internationalization, and antidumping protection mechanism have also become the focus of theory and case study.
sentences.chinese: 反倾销已经成为我国企业国际化进程中的“拦路虎”，构建反倾销的防护机制成为实务界和理论界研究的重点。

sentences.english: a young mother trying to control her offspring
sentences.chinese: 一个想管住自己孩子的年轻妈妈

detailed_translations.english: someone’s child or children – often used humorously

sentences.english: His landlord doubled the rent.
sentences.chinese: 他的房东把房租提高了一倍。

detailed_translations.english: a man who rents a room, building, or piece of land to someone

sentences.english: an archaeological site
sentences.chinese: 考古现场

detailed_translations.english: a place where something important or interesting happened
to place or build something in a particular place

name: holder
trans: 持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物

sentences.english: the 800 m world record holder
sentences.chinese: 800米世界纪录保持者

sentences.english: Season-ticket holders are furious at the rise in rail fares.
sentences.chinese: 买季票的人对火车票价上涨极为愤怒。

sentences.english: British passport holders
sentences.chinese: 英国护照持有人

detailed_translations.chinese: 持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物
detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or controls something

sentences.english: a mail order catalog
sentences.chinese: 邮购商品目录

sentences.english: an online catalogue
sentences.chinese: 网上目录

detailed_translations.english: a complete list of things that you can look at, buy, or use, for example in a library or at an art show
to make a complete list of all the things in a group

sentences.english: The lead plaintiff of the lawsuit is the University of California.
sentences.chinese: 这次诉讼的第一原告是加利福尼亚大学。

detailed_translations.english: someone who brings a legal action against another person in a court of law

sentences.english: At school the other children treated them like royalty .
sentences.chinese: 在学校里，其他孩子将他们奉若王族。

detailed_translations.english: members of a royal family

name: back
trans: 后面；背部；靠背；足球等的后卫；书报等的末尾
以前；向后地；来回地；上溯；回来；回原处

sentences.english: I’ll be back in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 我马上回来。

sentences.english: Put that book back where you found it!
sentences.chinese: 把那本书放回原处！

sentences.english: He was back home by half past eleven.
sentences.chinese: 他是11点半之前回家的。

sentences.english: It’s possible to travel there and back in a day.
sentences.chinese: 到那里一天来回是可以的。

sentences.english: Kirov stepped back a pace.
sentences.chinese: 基洛夫往后退了一步。

detailed_translations.english: in, into, or to the place or position where someone or something was before

sentences.english: ...the cosmic laws governing our world.
sentences.chinese: …主宰我们世界的宇宙法则。

detailed_translations.english: relating to space or the universe

sentences.english: Tickets are limited and will be allocated to those who apply first.
sentences.chinese: 票数有限，将分配给那些先申请的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分配； 分派， 把…拨给
detailed_translations.english: to use something for a particular purpose, give something to a particular person etc, especially after an official decision has been made

sentences.english: Jack and Stephen were waiting for them on the quay.
sentences.chinese: 杰克和斯蒂芬正在码头等他们。

detailed_translations.english: a place in a town or village where boats can be tied up or can stop to load and unload goods

name: divide
trans: 划分；除；分开；使产生分歧

sentences.english: The book is divided into six sections.
sentences.chinese: 本书分为六部分。

sentences.english: The money will be divided equally among the charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将被平分给各慈善机构。

detailed_translations.english: if something divides, or if you divide it, it separates into two or more parts

sentences.english: Police appealed for wit­nesses after a woman was kidnapped at gunpoint.
sentences.chinese: 一名妇女遭到持枪绑架，警方呼吁目击者挺身而出。

detailed_translations.english: to take someone somewhere illegally by force, often in order to get money for returning them

name: material
trans: 重要的；物质的，实质性的；肉体的

sentences.english: materials like wood or stone
sentences.chinese: 木材或石头之类的材料

sentences.english: harmful radioactive material
sentences.chinese: 有害的放射性材料

sentences.english: a paper company which imports raw materials (= substances which have not been treated ) from North America
sentences.chinese: 从北美进口原材料的纸业公司

sentences.english: recycled material
sentences.chinese: 再生材料

sentences.english: Anita is collecting material for a novel.
sentences.chinese: 安妮塔正在收集小说素材。

sentences.english: a society that places high importance on material rewards
sentences.chinese: 重视物质回报的社会

detailed_translations.english: a solid substance such as wood, plastic, or metal
relating to your money, possessions, living conditions etc, rather than the needs of your mind or soul

sentences.english: Her paintings have been exhibited all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的绘画作品在世界各地展出。

detailed_translations.english: to show something in a public place so that people can go to see it
something, for example a painting, that is put in a public place so that people can go to see it

sentences.english: They threw down the challenge that he couldn’t wash 40 cars in one hour (= invited him to try to do it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑战，邀请比赛；艰巨的任务；怀疑，质问
detailed_translations.english: something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal

sentences.english: religious beliefs and practices
sentences.chinese: 宗教信仰和习俗

sentences.english: dangerous working practices
sentences.chinese: 危险的工作方法

detailed_translations.english: something that people do often, especially a particular way of doing something or a social or religious custom

sentences.english: a 100-watt bulb
sentences.chinese: 一个100瓦的灯泡

detailed_translations.english: the glass part of an electric light, that the light shines from

name: original
trans: 原始的；最初的；独创的；新颖的

sentences.english: The land was returned to its original owner.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地归还给了原主。

sentences.english: The kitchen still has many original features (= parts that were there when the house was first built ).
sentences.chinese: 这间厨房仍保留着当初的许多特点。

sentences.english: the original meaning of the word
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的原意

sentences.english: The original plan was to fly out to New York.
sentences.chinese: 原先的计划是飞往纽约。

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening first, before other people or things

sentences.english: Some experts are concerned that the new drug won’t live up to all the hype.
sentences.chinese: 一些专家担心这种新药并不像宣传中那么好。

sentences.english: Despite the media hype , I found the film very disappointing.
sentences.chinese: 尽管媒体大肆炒作，我还是觉得这部影片很让人失望。

detailed_translations.english: attempts to make people think something is good or important by talking about it a lot on television, the radio etc – used to show disapproval
to try to make people think something is good or important by talking about it a lot on television, the radio etc

sentences.english: She was always defending her husband in front of their daughter.
sentences.chinese: 她在女儿面前总是为丈夫辩解。

sentences.english: Students should be ready to explain and defend their views.
sentences.chinese: 学生应该勇于为自己的观点进行解释和辩护。

detailed_translations.english: to use arguments to protect something or someone from criticism, or to prove that something is right

sentences.english: The uprising was ruthlessly suppressed.
sentences.chinese: 起义受到了残酷的镇压。

detailed_translations.english: to stop people from opposing the government, especially by using force

name: proportion
trans: 比例，占比；部分；面积；均衡

sentences.english: A large proportion of the dolphins in that area will eventually die.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区的很大一部分海豚最终都会死去。

sentences.english: What’s the proportion of boys to girls in your class?
sentences.chinese: 你们班里男女生的比例是多少？

detailed_translations.english: a part of a number or an amount, considered in relation to the whole

sentences.english: the harmful effects of smoking
sentences.chinese: 吸烟的害处

detailed_translations.english: causing harm

name: percent
trans: 百分比，百分率；部分；百分数

sentences.english: At the end of the day, add up the percent DVs.
sentences.chinese: 在一天结束后，把所有营养素的百分比加起来。

sentences.english: Machines are delivering up to only 25 percent of the fuel they combust.
sentences.chinese: 机器的运转效率只能达到所耗燃料的百分之二十五。

sentences.english: But there are billions more people out there who are not in the top one percent, and they’re not in the top two or three either.
sentences.chinese: 但是还有十亿多的人不在其中，他们不在其中的百分之一，也不再其中的两百分之一或者三百分之一的其中。

sentences.english: I bust my watch this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我把手表摔坏了。

detailed_translations.english: to break something

detailed_translations.chinese: 胸像， 半身像； 胸部， 胸围
detailed_translations.english: a model of someone’s head, shoulders, and upper chest, usually made of stone or metal

sentences.english: With a skillful movement he rounded the small fishing-boat.
sentences.chinese: 他以灵巧的动作使小渔船调过头来。

sentences.english: I like making things by hand because my mother is very skillful, and I liked staying with her when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢亲手作一些东西，这是因为我母亲的手非常巧，而且我小的时候喜欢同她在一起。

sentences.english: They understand that development is a difficult social activity that can be conquered not by a silver bullet, but rather by dedicated, skillful practitioners who know and leverage proven techniques.
sentences.chinese: 开发是一项有难度的社会活动，不仅不能够通过银弹来征服，而是由理解并实施可靠技术的那些专注且熟练的人们来解决。

name: remit
trans: 宽恕；免除；减轻；传送；使恢复原状

detailed_translations.chinese: 宽恕；免除；减轻；传送；使恢复原状
detailed_translations.english: to free someone from a debt or punishment

name: bend
trans: 使弯曲；使屈服；使致力；使朝向

sentences.english: Lee bent and kissed her.
sentences.chinese: 李俯下身来亲她。

sentences.english: She bent her head.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头。

sentences.english: Bend your knees, but keep your back straight.
sentences.chinese: 膝盖弯曲，背部保持挺直。

detailed_translations.english: to move part of your body so that it is not straight or so that you are not upright
to become curved and no longer flat or straight
a curved part of something, especially a road or river

sentences.english: You have probably heard of this tactic before.
sentences.chinese: 你以前也可能听说过这个策略。

sentences.english: Over the next few months, however, that tactic will be difficult to sustain.
sentences.chinese: 然而在接下去的几个月这个策略将很难维持下去。

sentences.english: To do this we must reorientate training for mental health specialists, ring-fence time for these activities in job contracts, and provide incentives for community engagement.
sentences.chinese: 要做到这点，我们必须重新定位心理卫生专业人士的培训，在就业合同中反复强调这些事项，并为这一共同约定提供激励措施。

sentences.english: So in order to develop private economy better, we must reorientate to the government's function, this paper has carried on the discussion on the issue.
sentences.chinese: 因此为了更好的发展民营经济，我们必须对政府的职能进行重新定位，本文就针对这一问题进行了探讨。

sentences.english: With nearly 3 years passing by I have to reorientate my future.
sentences.chinese: 转眼快3年过去了，我要重新确定我未来的方向。

name: absent
trans: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的

sentences.english: The dull, absent look on her face implied boredom.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上呆滞、茫然的神情说明她觉得无聊了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的
detailed_translations.english: not at work, school, a meeting etc, because you are sick or decide not to go
to not go to a place or take part in an event where people expect you to be

name: discretion
trans: 自由裁量权；谨慎；判断力；判定；考虑周到

sentences.english: British newspapers no longer feel they must treat the royal family with discretion.
sentences.chinese: 英国报界不再觉得他们非得审慎对待王室不可了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自由裁量权；谨慎；判断力；判定；考虑周到
detailed_translations.english: the ability to deal with situations in a way that does not offend, upset, or embarrass people or tell any of their secrets

sentences.english: Since earliest times, mankind has been fascinated by fire.
sentences.chinese: 人类自远古以来就对火很感兴趣。

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重要的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: all humans considered as a group

sentences.english: Steve seemed to acquiesce in the decision.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂夫看样子默许了这个决定。

detailed_translations.english: to do what someone else wants, or allow something to happen, even though you do not really agree with it

sentences.english: Since its creation, the Fund has held the backing to the banknote issues of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 外汇基金自成立以来，一直持有作为支持发行香港纸币的资产。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper money

sentences.english: The gate is made of metal.
sentences.chinese: 这扇大门是用金属做成的。

sentences.english: a small black metal box
sentences.chinese: 一个黑色的金属小盒子

sentences.english: They traded in gold and other precious metals (= valuable metals used especially for making jewellery ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们做黄金和其他贵金属的交易。

sentences.english: The old trucks were sold as scrap metal (= old metal that is melted and used again ) .
sentences.chinese: 这些旧卡车被当作金属废料卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: a hard, usually shiny substance such as iron, gold, or steel

sentences.english: Children are often very resilient.
sentences.chinese: 儿童的适应力一般都很强。

sentences.english: The company proved remarkably resilient during the recession.
sentences.chinese: 公司在经济衰退期间表现出惊人的耐挫力。

detailed_translations.english: able to become strong, happy, or successful again after a difficult situation or event

name: bush
trans: 以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭
如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的

sentences.english: a rose bush
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰丛

sentences.english: The child was hiding in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子躲在灌木丛里。

detailed_translations.english: a plant with many thin branches growing up from the ground

detailed_translations.chinese: 以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭
如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的

name: incorrect
trans: 错误的，不正确的；不适当的；不真实的

sentences.english: The information you gave us was incorrect.
sentences.chinese: 你给我们的信息不准确。

detailed_translations.english: not correct or true

name: crash
trans: 撞碎；坠毁；破产；轰隆声；睡觉
摔碎；坠落；发出隆隆声；(金融企业等)破产

sentences.english: We watched the waves crashing against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

sentences.english: The plates went crashing to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声摔落到地上。

sentences.english: A large branch came crashing down .
sentences.chinese: 一根大树枝啪啦一声掉落下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 倒下，坠落；发出撞击声；垮台，破产
detailed_translations.english: to hit something or someone extremely hard while moving, in a way that causes a lot of damage or makes a lot of noise
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else
a sudden loud noise made by something falling, breaking etc

sentences.english: In such circumstances, governments must do all they can to create and engender trust among its nation’s constituents and institutions.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，政府必须尽其所能在它的国家选民和公共机构之间创造和产生信任。

sentences.english: Retrospectives on the process and working practices regularly capture the lessons learned by the project and engender a culture of continuous process improvement within the project.
sentences.chinese: 对过程和工作实践的回顾有规律地捕捉从项目中得到的经验，并在项目中造成一个持续的过程改进的文化。

sentences.english: When the investigation is concluded, the results will be sent to the US Attorney’s office.
sentences.chinese: 等到调查结束后，结果会被送到联邦检察官办公室。

sentences.english: Francis, having concluded his business with James, left for Miami.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯完成了和詹姆斯的买卖后就去了迈阿密。

detailed_translations.english: to complete something you have been doing, especially for a long time

detailed_translations.chinese: 推断出，推论出；缔结，议定
detailed_translations.english: to decide that something is true after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: Society continues to idealize the two-parent family.
sentences.chinese: 社会依然把双亲家庭视为理想家庭。

sentences.english: an idealized view of marriage
sentences.chinese: 理想化的婚姻观

detailed_translations.english: to imagine or represent something or someone as being perfect or better than they really are

sentences.english: Genet started as a rebel, but soon became part of the literary mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 热内起初很叛逆，但不久就回归了文学主流。

detailed_translations.english: the most usual ideas or methods, or the people who have these ideas or methods

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.english: a roofing contractor
sentences.chinese: 盖屋顶的承包商

detailed_translations.english: a person or company that agrees to do work or provide goods for another company

name: condition
trans: 决定；使适应；使健康；以…为条件

sentences.english: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

sentences.english: prudent house buyers
sentences.chinese: 谨慎的购房者

detailed_translations.english: sensible and careful, especially by trying to avoid unnecessary risks

name: select
trans: 精选的；挑选出来的；极好的

sentences.english: The party was small and select.
sentences.chinese: 团里人员不多，都是经过精心挑选的。

sentences.english: Honorary degrees are handed out to a select few .
sentences.chinese: 荣誉学位颁给挑选出的少数几个人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精选的， 挑选出来的； 优等的， 第一流的
detailed_translations.english: a select group of people or things is a small special group that has been chosen carefully
to choose something or someone by thinking carefully about which is the best, most suitable etc

name: electric
trans: 电的；电动的；发电的；导电的；令人震惊的

sentences.english: an electric blanket
sentences.chinese: 电热毯

detailed_translations.english: needing electricity to work, produced by electricity, or used for carrying electricity

name: dividend
trans: 红利；股息；[数] 被除数；奖金

sentences.english: The first quarter dividend has been increased by nearly 4 percent.
sentences.chinese: 第一季度的股息增加了近4％。

detailed_translations.chinese: 红利；股息；[数] 被除数；奖金
detailed_translations.english: a part of a company’s profit that is divided among the people with  share s  in the company

name: requisition
trans: 征用；要求；申请书；引渡要求

sentences.english: ...a requisition for a replacement photocopier.
sentences.chinese: ...一份更换复印机的授权书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 征用；要求；申请书；引渡要求
detailed_translations.english: A requisition is a written document which allows a person or organization to obtain goods
if someone in authority, especially the army, requisitions a building, vehicle, or food, they officially demand to have it during an  emergency  such as a war

sentences.english: a successful economy
sentences.chinese: 发展成功的经济

sentences.english: the slowdown in the Japanese economy
sentences.chinese: 日本经济的减缓

sentences.english: The gas fire was turned low for reasons of economy.
sentences.chinese: 为了节省，把煤气取暖器开小了。

detailed_translations.english: the system by which a country’s money and goods are produced and used, or a country considered in this way

sentences.english: Another thing you can do is save the worksheet and send it to somebody else.
sentences.chinese: 您可以做的另一件事情是保存工作表并将其发送给其他人。

sentences.english: If you do this to each worksheet item your test case script looks similar to Listing 6.
sentences.chinese: 如果您对每个工作表条目这样做，您的测试脚本看起来类似于列表6。

sentences.english: You can manipulate the worksheet by adding columns and rows, including data from other sources, creating formulas for computations, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 您可以通过添加列和行、包括其他来源的数据、创建用于计算的公式等，从而操作工作表。

name: diplomatic
trans: 外交的；外交上的；老练的

sentences.english: Diplomatic efforts to end the fighting began on October 25.
sentences.chinese: 停战的外交努力于10月25日开始。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving the work of diplomats

name: period
trans: 周期，期间；时期；月经；课时；（语法学）句点，句号

sentences.english: Tomorrow’s weather will be dry with sunny periods.
sentences.chinese: 明天天气干燥，间或晴朗。

sentences.english: a double period of Science
sentences.chinese: 一连两节的自然科学课

sentences.english: Pay attention to punctuation, especially to the correct use of commas and periods.
sentences.chinese: 注意标点，特别是逗号和句号的正确使用方法。

detailed_translations.english: a particular length of time with a beginning and an end

name: cost
trans: 花费；使付出；使花许多钱

sentences.english: I offered to pay the cost of the taxi.
sentences.chinese: 我提出支付出租车费。

sentences.english: Insurance to cover the cost of a funeral is possible.
sentences.chinese: 可以用保险支付葬礼费用。

sentences.english: This doesn’t include the cost of repairing the damage.
sentences.chinese: 这不包括修理破损的费用。

sentences.english: the terrible cost of the war in death and suffering
sentences.chinese: 这场战争造成的死亡与苦难的惨重代价

sentences.english: low cost housing
sentences.chinese: 低成本住宅

sentences.english: the high cost of production
sentences.chinese: 很高的生产成本

sentences.english: A cassette/radio is included at no extra cost .
sentences.chinese: 附送一台卡式收录机。

sentences.english: The funds will just cover the museum’s running costs .
sentences.chinese: 这些资金只够支付博物馆的运转费用。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you have to pay in order to buy, do, or produce something

sentences.english: There are many methods of accounting, such as cash method of accounting, cost method of accounting, accrual method of accounting.
sentences.chinese: 会计核算的方法有多种，如收付实现制核算法、成本核算法、权责发生制核算法。

sentences.english: The accrual method assumes that when a company makes a sale, the revenue will be received in the coming future, and it includes the sale in the accounts of the company.
sentences.chinese: 权责发生制基于这样的假定，当公司销售一批商品时，它会在将来某个时间收到这笔款项，公司账簿中应包含这项销售。

name: economic
trans: 经济的，经济上的；经济学的

sentences.english: Economic growth is slow.
sentences.chinese: 经济增长缓慢。

sentences.english: the government’s economic policy
sentences.chinese: 政府的经济政策

sentences.english: Economic reform is needed.
sentences.chinese: 经济改革势在必行。

sentences.english: In the current economic climate (= conditions ), we must keep costs down.
sentences.chinese: 在当前的经济形势下，我们一定要控制好成本。

detailed_translations.english: relating to trade, in-dustry, and the management of money

name: render
trans: 致使；提出；实施；着色；以…回报

sentences.english: an obligation to render assistance to those in need
sentences.chinese: 为有困难的人提供援助的义务

sentences.english: a bill of $3,200 for services rendered
sentences.chinese: 一张3,200美元服务费的账单

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or do something, because it is your duty or because someone expects you to

sentences.english: There’s a big difference between knowing that something is true, and being able to prove it.
sentences.chinese: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.english: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.
sentences.chinese: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.english: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

detailed_translations.english: a way in which two or more people or things are not like each other

sentences.english: They need to optimize the use of available resources.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要充分利用手上的资源。

detailed_translations.english: to improve the way that something is done or used so that it is as effective as possible

sentences.english: the Battle of Trafalgar
sentences.chinese: 特拉法尔加战役

sentences.english: a pitched battle (=  a long and serious battle  ) between police and drug gangs
sentences.chinese: 警方和贩毒团伙之间的一场激战

detailed_translations.english: a fight between opposing armies, groups of ships, groups of people etc, especially one that is part of a larger war

name: benchmark
trans: 用基准问题测试（计算机系统等）

sentences.english: benchmark data
sentences.chinese: 基准数据

sentences.english: The valuation becomes a benchmark against which to judge other prices.
sentences.chinese: 这个估价成了判断其他价格的依据。

detailed_translations.english: something that is used as a standard by which other things can be judged or measured

detailed_translations.chinese: 用基准问题测试（计算机系统等）

name: sound
trans: 听（诊）；测量，测…深；使发声；试探；宣告
声音，语音；噪音；海峡；吵闹；听力范围；[医] 探条
健全的，健康的；合理的；可靠的；有效彻底的

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: complete and thorough

sentences.english: Delay always breeds danger; and to protract a great design is often to ruin it.
sentences.chinese: 推迟经常孕育危险；拖延一个伟大的工程常常意味着毁灭它。

sentences.english: To protract the suspense, he paused for a considerable period of time before telling us the result of the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 为了延长悬念，他在告诉我们实验结果之前停顿了相当一段时间。

detailed_translations.english: to lengthen or extend (a speech, etc); prolong in time

name: belt
trans: 用带子系住；用皮带抽打

sentences.english: He unbuckled his leather belt.
sentences.chinese: 他解开皮带。

detailed_translations.english: a band of leather, cloth etc that you wear around your waist to hold up your clothes or for decoration

detailed_translations.chinese: 用带子系住；用皮带抽打
detailed_translations.english: to fasten something with a belt

sentences.english: The authors summarize their views in the introduction.
sentences.chinese: 作者在序言里概述了他们的观点。

detailed_translations.english: to make a short statement giving only the main information and not the details of a plan, event, report etc

name: innovative
trans: 革新的，创新的；新颖的；有创新精神的

sentences.english: an innovative approach to language teaching
sentences.chinese: 创新的语言教学法

sentences.english: innovative schemes for recycling waste materials
sentences.chinese: 废物回收利用的创新计划

detailed_translations.english: an innovative idea or way of doing something is new, different, and better than those that existed before

name: profitability
trans: 盈利能力；收益性；利益率

sentences.english: a decline in company profitability
sentences.chinese: 公司利润的下降

name: tangible
trans: 有形的；切实的；可触摸的

sentences.english: The silence of the countryside was almost tangible .
sentences.chinese: 乡村的寂静几乎能感觉得到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有形的；切实的；可触摸的
detailed_translations.english: if something is tangible, you can touch or feel it

name: freehold
trans: 自由保有；[会计] 不动产所有权

sentences.english: They bought the freehold of their house.
sentences.chinese: 他们买下了房子的自由保有权。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自由保有；[会计] 不动产所有权
detailed_translations.english: when you completely own a building or piece of land for an unlimited time

sentences.english: Having raised expectations (= made people more hopeful ), he went on to help only a few people.
sentences.chinese: 他唤起了大家的希望，但接着只是帮助了几个人。

sentences.english: The show exceeded all expectations (= was much better than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 这场演出比人们预期的要好得多。

sentences.english: The number of people who attended fell short of expectations (= was lower than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 出席的人数比预期的要少。

detailed_translations.english: what you think or hope will happen

sentences.english: a period of relative stability
sentences.chinese: 相对稳定的一段时期

detailed_translations.english: the condition of being steady and not changing

name: corn
trans: （美）玉米；（英）谷物；[皮肤] 鸡眼

sentences.english: fields of corn
sentences.chinese: 一片片麦田

sentences.english: an ear of corn
sentences.chinese: 谷穗

detailed_translations.english: plants such as wheat,  barley  , and  oats  or their seeds

sentences.english: After all the ballyhoo, the film was a flop.
sentences.chinese: 尽管炒作得厉害，这部电影还是不卖座。

sentences.english: The power of red wine to counteract high cholesterol has been ballyhooed in the press.
sentences.chinese: 红酒中和高胆固醇的功效在媒体上被夸大了。

sentences.english: ...the much-ballyhooed new Star Wars film.
sentences.chinese: ...该部受到大肆宣传的新《星球大战》电影。

detailed_translations.english: when there is a lot of excitement or anger about something – used to show disapproval

If you say that something is ballyhooed, you mean that there is a lot of excitement about it and people are claiming that it is very good. You use this word especially when you think the thing is not as exciting or good as people say.

name: pacesetter
trans: 标兵；先导者，步调调整者

sentences.english: Mongolia seemed an unlikely candidate as the pacesetter for political change in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古看来不太会做亚洲政治变革的先驱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 标兵；先导者，步调调整者
detailed_translations.english: A pacesetter is a person or a company that is considered to be the leader in a particular field or activity

name: collector
trans: 收藏家；[电子] 集电极；收税员；征收者

sentences.english: a stamp collector
sentences.chinese: 集邮者

sentences.english: The painting was bought by a private collector.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画被一个私人收藏家买走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收藏家；[电子] 集电极；收税员；征收者
detailed_translations.english: someone who collects things that are interesting or attractive

name: federation
trans: 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府

sentences.english: the National Federation of Women’s Institutes
sentences.chinese: 〔英国及英联邦国家〕妇女协会全国联合会

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府
detailed_translations.english: a group of organizations, clubs, or people that have joined together to form a single group

name: petition
trans: 请愿；请愿书；祈求；[法] 诉状

sentences.english: Local residents have drawn up a petition to protest the hospital closure.
sentences.chinese: 当地居民已草拟了一份请愿书，抗议关闭医院。

sentences.english: Villagers petitioned the local authority to provide better bus services.
sentences.chinese: 村民请愿要求地方当局提供更好的公共汽车服务。

detailed_translations.english: a written request signed by a lot of people, asking someone in authority to do something or change something
to ask the government or an organization to do something by sending them a petition

sentences.english: The trade deficit has skyrocketed.
sentences.chinese: 贸易逆差已经急剧增长。

sentences.english: skyrocketing inflation
sentences.chinese: 飙升的通货膨胀率

detailed_translations.english: if a price or an amount skyrockets, it greatly increases very quickly

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

name: pirate
trans: 海盗；盗版；侵犯专利权者

sentences.english: Computer game pirates cost the industry twenty million pounds a year.
sentences.chinese: 电脑游戏盗版者每年要给该行业带来两千万英镑的损失。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海盗；盗版；侵犯专利权者
detailed_translations.english: someone who sails on the seas, attacking other boats and stealing things from them
to illegally copy and sell another person’s work such as a book, video, or computer program

name: profile
trans: 侧面；轮廓；外形；剖面；简况

sentences.english: Dani has a lovely profile.
sentences.chinese: 达尼的侧面轮廓很好看。

detailed_translations.chinese: 侧面；人物简介；轮廓，形象；姿态，引人注目的状态
detailed_translations.english: a side view of someone’s head
to write or give a short description of someone or something

sentences.english: Please enclose a cheque with your order.
sentences.chinese: 请随订单附上支票。

sentences.english: The pool area is enclosed by a six-foot wall.
sentences.chinese: 游泳区用六英尺高的高墙围了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to put something inside an envelope as well as a letter

sentences.english: We could hear the neighbours arguing.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到邻居在争吵。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with someone in words, often in an angry way
to persuade someone to do or not do something

name: regular
trans: 定期的；有规律的；合格的；整齐的；普通的
常客；正式队员；中坚分子

sentences.english: The company holds regular meetings with employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.english: His breathing was slow and regular.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸缓慢而均匀。

sentences.english: Trains will run at regular intervals from 11 am to 4 pm.
sentences.chinese: 火车从上午11点到下午4点每隔一定时间开行。

sentences.english: We hear from him on a regular basis .
sentences.chinese: 我们定期收到他的来信。

sentences.english: He phones us every Sunday at six, regular as clockwork (= always at the same time ) .
sentences.chinese: 他每逢星期天6点钟打电话给我们，非常准时。

sentences.english: a regular job
sentences.chinese: 固定的工作

detailed_translations.english: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

sentences.english: Her grandmother lent her a camera for a school trip to Venice and Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 她的祖母借给她一部相机，让她在学校组织的到威尼斯和埃及的旅行中使用。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used to take photographs or make films or television programmes

sentences.english: The president has already given his approval to the plan.
sentences.chinese: 总统已经批准了这个计划。

sentences.english: It is just three months since we received official approval to go ahead with the project.
sentences.chinese: 三个月前我们刚刚得到正式批准进行这个项目。

sentences.english: A company cannot be sold without the approval of the shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 没有股东的同意不能出售公司。

sentences.english: The bill will be submitted for approval by Congress.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案将提交国会通过。

sentences.english: The President would appoint the Council of Ministers, subject to the approval of the National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 总统将任命内阁成员，但需经国民议会批准。

sentences.english: The IMF has given its seal of approval to the government’s economic strategy.
sentences.chinese: 国际货币基金组织已经同意该政府的经济策略。

sentences.english: appointments requiring parliamentary approval
sentences.chinese: 需经议会批准的任命

sentences.english: She looked to Greg for approval.
sentences.chinese: 她指望格雷格同意。

detailed_translations.english: when a plan, decision, or person is officially accepted

sentences.english: We regret any inconvenience caused to our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们对于给顾客造成的不便表示歉意。

sentences.english: It is with great regret that I must decline your offer.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我不得不谢绝你的好意。

detailed_translations.english: to feel sorry about sth you have done or about sth that you have not been able to do
sadness that you feel about something, especially because you wish it had not happened

sentences.english: ‘I’m going to Appleby tomorrow.’ ‘ What a coincidence ! I’m going there too.’
sentences.chinese: “明天我要去阿普尔比。”“太巧了！我也要去那里。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 巧合， 巧事； 一致， 符合
detailed_translations.english: when two things happen at the same time, in the same place, or to the same people in a way that seems surprising or unusual

name: sacred
trans: 神的；神圣的；宗教的；庄严的

sentences.english: a sacred vow
sentences.chinese: 神圣的誓言

sentences.english: the miraculous powers of sacred relics
sentences.chinese: 圣物的神奇力量

sentences.english: Certain animals were considered sacred.
sentences.chinese: 有些动物被认为是神圣的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 神的；神圣的；宗教的；庄严的
detailed_translations.english: relating to a god or religion

sentences.english: There are huge budgetary pressures on all governments in Europe to reduce their armed forces.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲各国政府都面临着巨大的裁军预算压力。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the way money is spent in a budget

name: reference
trans: 参考，参照；涉及，提及；参考书目；介绍信；证明书

detailed_translations.english: to develop and use minerals, forests, oil etc for business or industry

sentences.english: He worked as a printer, riverboat pilot, reporter, lecturer, and literary man, and he lived in just about every kind of population center, from farms, small towns, and mining camps to great cities.
sentences.chinese: 他曾从事印刷工、河道船舶引水员、记者、讲演者和文学家的工作，足迹几乎遍及每一种类型的人口居住地，其中有农场、小镇，也有矿区营地和大城市。

detailed_translations.english: A riverboat is a large boat that carries passengers along a river

sentences.chinese: 你需要付清欠款，外加利息。

detailed_translations.english: if money is owing, it has not yet been paid to the person who should receive it

name: unit
trans: 单位，单元；装置；[军] 部队；部件

sentences.chinese: 家庭是现代社会的基本单位。

sentences.english: control/display/filter etc unit
sentences.chinese: 控制/显示/过滤等装置

detailed_translations.english: a thing, person, or group that is regarded as one single whole part of something larger

trans: 立即的；直接的；最接近的

sentences.chinese: 我们对攻击的第一反应就是非常惊恐。

sentences.english: If the eyes are affected, seek immediate medical attention.
sentences.chinese: 如果眼睛感染了要立即就医。

sentences.chinese: 只有她的直系亲属参加了葬礼。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done at once and without delay

sentences.english: the different nationalities within the former USSR

trans: 分包合同；[经] 转包合同

sentences.chinese: 他们让外包商决定找谁去完成这项工作、是否转包给他人、哪些部分实行自动化以及是否利用在别处成功的方案。

sentences.chinese: 这两个公司刚签订了一个转包合同。

name: regional
trans: 地区的；局部的；整个地区的

sentences.chinese: 农耕方式的地区性差异

name: registered
trans: 注册的；记名的；登记过的；（家畜等）附有血统证明的

trans: 真实的，实际的；现行的，目前的

sentences.chinese: 该世纪上半叶，人口大幅度增加。

sentences.chinese: 市中心热闹的新年庆祝活动

trans: 最新的，最近的；最迟的，最后的

sentences.chinese: 他打电话告诉我最新的消息。

sentences.english: His latest novel was cut up by the reviewers.
sentences.chinese: 他的最新小说被评论家批得体无完肤。

sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

sentences.chinese: 那辆汽车拐弯太快了。

trans: 分配；指派；[计][数] 赋值

sentences.chinese: 取款机

sentences.chinese: 他在一家美国大公司工作。

sentences.chinese: 别来怪我——又不是我的错。

sentences.chinese: 她变得过分地猜忌，接着是一场激烈的打斗。

sentences.chinese: 你选择做自由职业者的原因就是自由，是吧？

sentences.chinese: 研习商务：事实上，你阅读这篇博客是一个好的现象，因为从中你可以知道许多关于自由职业者如何经营自己事业的信息。

sentences.english: huge crowds

name: enable
trans: 使能够，使成为可能；授予权利或方法

sentences.chinese: 我们在雷达屏幕上可清晰地看到飞机。

sentences.chinese: 他们只是名义上皈依了基督教。

sentences.chinese: 她从书桌的抽屉里拿出了一个文件夹。

sentences.chinese: 剪刀在厨房的抽屉里。

detailed_translations.english: part of a piece of furniture, such as a desk, that you pull out and push in and use to keep things in

sentences.english: There are still two vacancies on the school board.
sentences.chinese: 学校董事会还有两个职位空缺。

sentences.chinese: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.english: I hate having to hurry a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.chinese: 股票价格在上周下跌之后，今天出现了反弹。

detailed_translations.english: a hollow place in a wall, often made to hold a statue

sentences.chinese: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.chinese: 她转过头审视女儿苍白的面容。

sentences.chinese: 提示代收行或持票人将汇票出示并提交给受票人，要求承兑或付款的行为叫做提示。

sentences.chinese: 新当选的总统紧随其后，坐着6匹灰色骏马开道的敞篷马车。

sentences.chinese: 来自有轨电车的流浪者用洗发水淹没火腿汉堡。

sentences.chinese: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.chinese: 她会怀着难以形容的满意心情主持这位年轻继承人的天真的用餐，那副神态就几乎像在这个款待中她跟理查兹共同享有所有权似的。

sentences.chinese: 在他外出时他把簿记工作交给了我。

sentences.chinese: 加入这些小组后，妇女们可以学识字和写字，学习记帐和其它技能。

sentences.chinese: 五万英镑的头奖

detailed_translations.chinese: 头奖；累积赌注；十分成功

sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

sentences.chinese: …8家抵押贷款公司，其中7家濒临破产。

sentences.chinese: 恐怕我没有受到邀请。

sentences.english: Successful candidates will be invited for interview next week.
sentences.chinese: 通过甄别的候选人将获邀于下周参加面试。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc

sentences.chinese: 我们抵制所有拿动物做试验的产品。

sentences.english: Sian: Exactly, this term is a combination of 'cyber' — relating to computers — and hypochondriac.
sentences.chinese: 希安： 没错，这个词是与电脑有关的“网络”和“疑病症患者”这两个词的结合。 我们来听几个例句。

sentences.chinese: 每一章的开头都有一首短诗。

sentences.chinese: 从我一开始干记者这一行，我就写性别议题的题材。

sentences.chinese: 我以为他爱我，也许开始时他确实是爱我的。

sentences.chinese: 那次邂逅展开了一段长久而幸福的关系。

sentences.chinese: 他出身卑微，如今已腰缠万贯。

sentences.english: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

trans: 反常的，不规则的；变态的

sentences.chinese: 我父母认为一个男孩子对芭蕾舞感兴趣并不正常。

trans: 明显的；可感知的；易觉察的

detailed_translations.chinese: 明显的；可感知的；易觉察的

trans: 打扫；扫除（sweep的现在分词形式）

sentences.chinese: 美国现在必须扮演一个强有力的领导人角色。

sentences.chinese: 保守党的领导人角逐

sentences.chinese: 下一届领导人选举将在十一月举行。

detailed_translations.english: the position of being the leader of a group, organization, country etc

sentences.chinese: 抛硬币决定谁先来。

sentences.chinese: 合并谈判

sentences.english: However, entrepreneurship is clearly growing on them, as more than a quarter of graduates (26 per cent) reported starting their own company during their EMBA or since graduating.
sentences.chinese: 然而，学员身上的创业精神明显在增强，超过四分之一的毕业生（26%）称在就读EMBA期间或毕业后创办了自己的公司。

detailed_translations.english: Entrepreneurship is the state of being an entrepreneur, or the activities associated with being an entrepreneur

sentences.chinese: 精明的新加坡人很快看到了一个套利机会。

sentences.chinese: …超过40%的成年人利用电视作为他们了解艺术信息的主要来源。

sentences.chinese: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.chinese: 一系列正版的迪士尼商品在出售。

sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节期间，商店营业到很晚。

sentences.chinese: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

trans: 使复位；改变…的位置；使变换阵地

sentences.chinese: 想要挪动地毯又不损坏它是不可能的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使复位；改变…的位置；使变换阵地

sentences.chinese: 该州长无权撤销这项裁决。

sentences.chinese: 凯利在一生中遭遇了种种艰巨任务与挑战，但成功了。

name: recipient

sentences.chinese: …最大的美国对外援助接受方。

sentences.chinese: 许多国有公司被私有化了。

detailed_translations.english: if a government privatizes an organization, industry, or service that it owns or controls, it sells it

sentences.chinese: 那个邮包上周送到了。

sentences.english: He sends regular food parcels to his family in Libya.
sentences.chinese: 他定期给在利比亚的家人邮寄食品包裹。

detailed_translations.english: an object that has been wrapped in paper or put in a special envelope, especially so that it can be sent by post

trans: 行动；功绩；证书；[法] 契据

sentences.chinese: 上午做了好事之后，他理应休息一下。

sentences.chinese: 她试图掐死自己的宝宝，她的情人帮着完成了这个罪恶的勾当。

sentences.chinese: 他那次旅程的首要目的是探访家人。

sentences.chinese: 教书是她主要的收入来源。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is in charge of a school

sentences.english: The Government are planning further cuts in public spending.
sentences.chinese: 政府正计划进一步削减公共支出。

sentences.english: The US government has tightened restrictions on firearms.
sentences.chinese: 美国政府已经加强了对枪支的管制。

sentences.english: Neither party had the majority necessary to form a government.
sentences.chinese: 两个政党都没有获得组阁所必需的多数票。

sentences.english: strong government
sentences.chinese: 强有力的统治

sentences.english: The car was travelling at a very slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 汽车正以非常慢的速度行驶。

sentences.chinese: 慢慢走着的人

sentences.chinese: 经济将面临增长更缓慢的一年。

sentences.english: Take a few deep, slow breaths.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地深吸几口气。

sentences.chinese: 我开始走得越来越慢。

detailed_translations.english: not moving, being done, or happening quickly
In informal English, slower is used to mean "at a slower speed" and slowest is used to mean "at the slowest speed." In nonstandard English, slow is used to mean "with little speed."

name: engine
trans: 引擎，发动机；机车，火车头；工具

sentences.english: Is the engine running smoothly?
sentences.chinese: 发动机运转平稳吗？

sentences.english: We were stranded with engine trouble on a deserted highway.
sentences.chinese: 我们因发动机故障而被困在空无一人的公路上。

sentences.english: In 1941, the train would have been pulled by a steam engine.
sentences.chinese: 1941年，火车可能已由蒸汽机车来牵引了。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a vehicle that produces power to make it move

sentences.english: It is worth consulting the guide to see whether your income is taxable.
sentences.chinese: 值得查一下这本手册看看你的收入是否该纳税。

detailed_translations.english: if money that you receive is taxable, you have to pay tax on it

name: refreshment
trans: 点心；起提神作用的东西；精力恢复

sentences.english: Refreshments will be served after the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 会后有茶点招待。

detailed_translations.chinese: 点心；起提神作用的东西；精力恢复
detailed_translations.english: small amounts of food and drink that are provided at a meeting, sports event etc

name: launder
trans: 洗涤；清洗；洗黑钱（把来路可疑的钱弄得貌似合法）

sentences.english: He was jailed of laundering drug money.
sentences.chinese: 他因帮毒贩洗钱而锒铛入狱。

detailed_translations.english: to wash and iron clothes, sheets etc

name: portfolio
trans: 公文包；文件夹；证券投资组合；部长职务

sentences.english: an investment portfolio
sentences.chinese: 投资组合

detailed_translations.chinese: 公文包；文件夹；证券投资组合；部长职务
detailed_translations.english: a large flat case used especially for carrying pictures, documents etc

name: plate
trans: 碟；金属板；金属牌；感光底片

sentences.chinese: 盘子里都堆满了米饭。

sentences.english: a beautiful necklace, plated with 22-carat gold
sentences.chinese: 一条漂亮的22开镀金项链

detailed_translations.english: flat and usually round dish that you eat from or serve food on
to be covered with a thin covering of gold or silver

name: courier
trans: 导游；情报员，通讯员；送快信的人

sentences.english: ...a motorcycle courier.
sentences.chinese: …一名骑摩托车的信使。

detailed_translations.chinese: 导游；情报员，通讯员；送快信的人
detailed_translations.english: A courier is a person who is paid to take letters and packages direct from one place to another

sentences.english: attempts to improve the image of the police
sentences.chinese: 提升警察形象的努力

sentences.english: He had the clearest image in his mind of his mother and father.
sentences.chinese: 他脑海中对父母的印象极其清晰。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion people have of a person, organization, product etc, or the way a person, organization etc seems to be to the public

sentences.english: A young Moroccan stopped by police refused to show his papers.
sentences.chinese: 一个被警察拦住的摩洛哥青年拒绝出示他的身份证件。

detailed_translations.english: Your papers are official documents, such as your passport or identity card, that prove who you are or that give you official permission to do something

name: capitalize
trans: 使资本化；以大写字母写；估计…的价值

sentences.english: The rebels seem to be trying to capitalize on the public's discontent with the government.
sentences.chinese: 反叛者们似乎正试图利用公众对政府的不满情绪。

detailed_translations.english: If you capitalize on a situation, you use it to gain some advantage for yourself

detailed_translations.chinese: 用大写字母书写；资本化；从…中获利
detailed_translations.english: to write a letter of the alphabet using a  capital  letter

sentences.english: Don’t forget to send us a postcard!
sentences.chinese: 别忘了给我们寄张明信片！

detailed_translations.english: a card that can be sent in the post without an envelope, especially one with a picture on it

sentences.chinese: 当使用分析时，它是典型的考虑时间花费在某些领域的比例（或百分比）。

trans: 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的

sentences.chinese: 你得给轮胎充气了。

sentences.chinese: 1月份零售额下降了1.3%。

sentences.chinese: 这样的一个大型节目进行巡演在技术和后勤方面都会面临大量实际问题。

sentences.chinese: 她独自一人在家感到不安全。

sentences.chinese: 她在努力应付繁重的工作量。

name: linear

sentences.chinese: ...涉嫌收取佣金和非法政党筹资。

sentences.chinese: 喂，接线员吗？请帮我接31号房间。

sentences.chinese: 关闭学校是大家一致通过的决定。

sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.chinese: 私立学校

sentences.chinese: 最新的纳税提案将失去远许多选民的支持。

trans: 日元（日本货币单位）；渴望

sentences.chinese: 这个容器的容量是1万立方米。

name: contemporary
trans: 同时代的人；同时期的东西
当代的；同时代的；属于同一时期的

sentences.chinese: 她为惠特尼·休斯敦等人创作大量当代音乐作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现代的， 当代的； 同时代的

sentences.english: Or put it on your busines card, billboard or a bumper sticker.
sentences.chinese: 或者把它放在你的名片、布告板、或者缓冲器中。

sentences.english: I tell teams working on print ads to start by creating a billboard.
sentences.chinese: 我告诉平面广告的工作团队，从制作一个广告牌开始。

sentences.english: Stop being some company's billboard, and show us YOU.
sentences.chinese: 停止做公司的广告牌，向我们展示 你自己 。

detailed_translations.english: a large sign used for advertising

trans: 建议；示意；微量，细微的迹象

sentences.english: Any suggestions would be welcome.
sentences.chinese: 任何建议都欢迎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 建议， 意见； 细微的迹象； 暗示
detailed_translations.english: an idea, plan, or possibility that someone mentions, or the act of mentioning it

sentences.english: Long-term savers qualify for a cash bonus.
sentences.chinese: 长期储户可获现金红利。

sentences.english: Further additions to your pay may take the form of bonus payments.
sentences.chinese: 工资以外的钱可能以奖金的形式发放。

sentences.english: Each worker receives an annual bonus.
sentences.chinese: 每个员工都可获得一笔年度奖金。

detailed_translations.english: money added to someone’s wages, especially as a reward for good work

sentences.english: Traditionally cut blue jeans carry a whiff of the laborer about them, so denim on a leader suggests a willingness to roll up the sleeves and dig in.
sentences.chinese: 传统剪裁的蓝色牛仔裤带有一种劳动者的气息，因此领导者穿着仔裤可以表达一种愿意卷起袖子大干一场的意思。

sentences.english: It is no use offering the manual laborer, tired out with a hard week’s sweat and effort, the chance of playing a game of football or baseball on Saturday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 对于那些体力劳动者来说，一周辛苦的工作使他们精疾力竭，因此在周六下午给他们提供踢足球或者打棒球的机会是没有意义的。

sentences.english: Basically, in 2009, the life of a wage laborer has the same essential features in every corner of the globe.
sentences.chinese: 在2009年，工资劳动者的生活，其基本特征在全球的各个角落都是大致相同的。

sentences.english: The field of literature has taken on a glory complexion during the socialism era. And it will lead to a diversification in the thinking mode of literature.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义新时期的文艺园地，呈现出摇曳多姿、竞艳争辉的繁荣局面，这必然引起人们文学观念和思维方式的变化。

sentences.english: Experts say the future of space tourism will show a mass, project diversification, companies competition and improve the four major trends in safety regulations.
sentences.chinese: 专家说，未来的空间旅游将显示一个大规模，项目多样化，企业竞争和提高安全法规的四大趋势。

sentences.english: Exploitation resulted diversification of habitat type which increasing some bird species . however , mangrove and mudflat reducing resulted disappear of some bird species.
sentences.chinese: 生境类型的多样化增加了不少鸟类物种，同时开发与破坏也导致了一些鸟类物种的消失。

name: securities
trans: [金融] 有价证券；担保；抵押物（security的复数）；保证人

sentences.english: The central bank will provide special loans, and the banks will pledge the land as security.
sentences.chinese: 中央银行将提供特别贷款,而各家银行将以土地作为抵押品。

detailed_translations.chinese: [金融] 有价证券；担保；抵押物（security的复数）；保证人
detailed_translations.english: If something is security for a loan, you promise to give that thing to the person who lends you money, if you fail to pay the money back

sentences.english: The bank is reassessing its criteria for lending money.

sentences.chinese: 停车限制将会严格执行。

sentences.english: It is unlikely that a record company would enforce its views on an established artist.
sentences.chinese: 唱片公司未必能强迫一位已出名的艺人接受他们的意见。

detailed_translations.english: to make people obey a rule or law

detailed_translations.english: an official document produced by a company showing how much  interest  it will pay on a  loan

sentences.english: The thought of taking the exam again depressed him.
sentences.chinese: 想到要补考，他就心情沮丧。

sentences.english: It depresses me that nobody seems to care.
sentences.chinese: 似乎没有人在乎，这让我感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Depress the clutch fully.

sentences.chinese: 比她的长相更让他惊讶的是她的沉着镇定。

to put or hold something in a carefully balanced position, especially above something else

sentences.chinese: 政府的经济和税收政策

把……送入车库；把（汽车）开进车库

sentences.chinese: 我把车停到车库去。

trans: 差的；自卑的；下级的，下等的

sentences.chinese: 我只要修改几个地方，然后就可以把它发送到打印机。

sentences.chinese: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.chinese: 至少你的对手财政上是理性的。

sentences.english: And you have to find a way to support yourself financially while you follow your passion.
sentences.chinese: 并且当你跟着你的激情走时，你必须找到一个办法在财政上支持你自己。

sentences.english: And I know it at Princeton, when you came, the Steve Forbes decided to no longer support the university financially. There have been protests at some of your talks.
sentences.chinese: 我知道当您刚刚来到普林斯顿大学的时候，福布斯集团决定不再支持,大学的财政开支，那时，有一些人,在您的讲座上抗议。

sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.chinese: 犯罪、失业等统计资料

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

sentences.chinese: 他们从未真的辞退过什么人。

sentences.chinese: 他因偷东西而被解雇。

sentences.chinese: 她称自己受到过解雇的威胁。

sentences.chinese: 新的议会将没有立法权。

sentences.chinese: 女性似乎觉得他很有吸引力。

sentences.chinese: 双方都同意签署该条约。

sentences.english: The peace treaty ends nearly four years of violence.
sentences.chinese: 该和平条约结束了将近四年的暴力。

trans: 古鲁（指印度教等宗教的宗师或领袖）；领袖；专家

sentences.english: It's up to us to either ignore the morale booster inside us or go out to the world and search for spiritual guru's and happiness, when all these things are very much present within us.
sentences.chinese: 当我们面临这些问题的时候，我们该决定是否忽略我们内心的道德推动或者接触这个世界来寻找精神领袖和快乐。

sentences.english: Become a trader, bounty hunter, rebel, stock market guru or a deadly space pirate.
sentences.chinese: 成为一个商人，津贴猎人，叛乱者，股票市场领袖或者一名极度的空间盗版者。

sentences.english: We find the defendant not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 我们裁定被告无罪。

sentences.chinese: 难民的主要需求是食物和住所。

detailed_translations.english: something that someone needs or asks for

sentences.chinese: 意大利食品已传遍世界。

the business of selling and sending goods to other countries

sentences.chinese: 我不愿意让她失望。

sentences.english: Great things were expected of this band, and they didn’t disappoint.
sentences.chinese: 大家对这支乐队的期望很高，而他们也不负众望。

trans: 超速，加速；加速，迅速前行；兴隆

sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

sentences.chinese: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

name: ahead
trans: 向前地；领先地；在（某人或某事物的）前面；预先；在将来，为未来

sentences.english: He kept his gaze fixed on the car ahead.
sentences.chinese: 他的目光一直盯着前面的那辆汽车。

sentences.english: We could see the lights of Las Vegas up ahead .
sentences.chinese: 我们能看到前方拉斯维加斯的灯光。

sentences.english: Henry hurried on ahead.
sentences.chinese: 亨利赶紧跑到前面。

sentences.english: The party was planned weeks ahead.
sentences.chinese: 聚会提前几个星期就已筹划好了。

sentences.english: One ounce of almonds contains nearly half the recommended daily amount.
sentences.chinese: 一盎司杏仁大约包含每日需求量的一半。

sentences.english: I knew every ounce would weigh on me like a little anchor, so I was determined not to include a single item that was unnecessary or superfluous.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到每盎司的重量都会成为一个小小的船锚压迫着我，所以我决定不带任何一样不必要的或多余的东西。

sentences.english: The 9” long, 9 ounce device works when you are in motion—just plug in your mobile device, place the nPower PEG vertically in your bag or on your hip and go for a walk or run.
sentences.chinese: 这种设备长9英寸，重9盎司，可在你运动过程中发电——只需把移动设备插到摇摇发电机上，并把发电机垂直地放在包�或挂在臀部，然后走动或跑动即可。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 28.35 grams. There are 16 ounces in a pound.

sentences.english: The data can be used to make useful economic predictions .
sentences.chinese: 这些数据可用于进行有用的经济预测。

detailed_translations.english: a statement about what you think is going to happen, or the act of making this statement

name: leverage
trans: 手段，影响力；杠杆作用；杠杆效率

sentences.chinese: 美国的外交影响力

detailed_translations.chinese: 手段，影响力；杠杆作用；杠杆效率
detailed_translations.english: influence that you can use to make people do what you want
to spread or use resources(= money, skills, buildings etc that an organization has available ), ideas etc again in several different ways or in different parts of a company, system etc

sentences.english: the President’s plan to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 总统刺激经济增长的计划

sentences.english: Her interest in art was stimulated by her father.
sentences.chinese: 她对艺术的兴趣是她父亲激发的。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage or help an activity to begin or develop further

sentences.english: When you define the project, you make sure that you have an agreement with the project sponsor on what work should be completed in this project.
sentences.chinese: 在你定义项目的时候，你要确保和项目发起人在项目应该完成的所有工作内容上达成一致意见。

sentences.english: It is important that your sponsor be truly committed to the value of the project to ensure that funds and support are not in jeopardy if adoption is not immediate.
sentences.chinese: 发起人必须真正认可项目的价值，这一点很重要，只有这样才能确保在推广没有立即见效时资金和支持不会随之消失。

sentences.english: The band will play (= perform at ) as many venues as possible.
sentences.chinese: 那支乐队将在尽可能多的地方演出。

sentences.english: He has lots of happy memories of his stay in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他对在日本逗留的那段时光有许多美好的回忆。

sentences.english: The data is stored in the computer’s memory.
sentences.chinese: 数据储存在电脑的存储器里

detailed_translations.english: something that you remember from the past about a person, place, or experience

name: draft
trans: 汇票；草稿；选派；（尤指房间、烟囱、炉子等供暖系统中的）（小股）气流
初步画出或（写出）的；（设计、草图、提纲或版本）正在起草中的，草拟的；以草稿形式的；草图的

sentences.english: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

sentences.english: The company is planning to shed about a quarter of its workforce.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正计划裁减约四分之一的人员。

sentences.english: The magazine is desperately trying to shed its old-fashioned image.
sentences.chinese: 这份杂志急于摆脱其过时的形象。

sentences.english: a diet to help you shed pounds
sentences.chinese: 帮助你减肥的食谱

detailed_translations.chinese: 脱落，脱去；流出，流下；发出，散发
detailed_translations.english: to get rid of something that you no longer need or want
a small building, often made of wood, used especially for storing things

name: arrears
trans: [会计] 拖欠；待完成的事；应付欠款

sentences.english: Many people are in arrears with their rent.
sentences.chinese: 许多人拖欠房租。

detailed_translations.chinese: [会计] 拖欠；待完成的事；应付欠款
detailed_translations.english: if someone is in arrears, or if their payments are in arrears, they are late in paying something that they should pay regularly, such as rent

sentences.english: He had no special privileges and was treated just like every other prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 他不享受特权，待遇和任何其他犯人一样。

detailed_translations.english: a special advantage that is given only to one person or group of people

name: approximation
trans: [数] 近似法；接近；[数] 近似值

sentences.english: That is a fair approximation of the way in which the next boss is being chosen.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个挑选下任老板的大体近似方式。

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 近似法；接近；[数] 近似值
detailed_translations.english: a number, amount etc that is not exact, but is almost correct

sentences.english: He was doing his best to be cooperative.
sentences.chinese: 他在尽全力配合。

sentences.english: a cooperative witness
sentences.chinese: 肯配合的目击者

detailed_translations.english: willing to cooperate

sentences.english: She replied to a lonely hearts ad she spotted in the New York Times.
sentences.chinese: 她回复了在《纽约时报》上看到的一则求友广告。

detailed_translations.english: an advertisement

sentences.english: Accounting information is the evidence of economic decision between the nation, investors and debtee.
sentences.chinese: 会计信息是国家、投资人、债权人和相关方经济决策的依据；

sentences.english: Under new development model, commercial bank is not the final debtee any more, and doesn't assume final risk.
sentences.chinese: 在新的发展模式下，商业银行不再是客户的最终债权人，因此也不承担最后的风险。

sentences.english: Atrustee in bankruptcy must be diligent and faithful in fulfilling bankruptcy affairs and accept the supervision by the People's Court, debtees' meeting and Debtee Committee.
sentences.chinese: 在履行破产事务时，应当勤免尽责、忠实履行职务，并接受人民法院、债权人会议和债权人委员会的监督。

sentences.english: He decided to adopt a different approach and teach the Bible through story-telling.
sentences.chinese: 他决定采用一种不同的方法，通过讲故事来教授《圣经》。

sentences.english: This book takes an unorthodox approach to art criticism.
sentences.chinese: 这本书采用的是非传统的艺术评论方法。

sentences.english: organizations which take a positive approach to creative thinking
sentences.chinese: 对创造性思维采取积极态度的组织

detailed_translations.english: a method of doing something or dealing with a problem

sentences.english: If negotiations are deadlocked , an arbitrator must be called in.
sentences.chinese: 如果谈判陷入僵局，就必须请一位仲裁人。

sentences.english: The dispute shall be submitted for arbitration by a mutually nominated arbitrator.
sentences.chinese: 这起纠纷应由一位双方共同指定的仲裁人提交仲裁。

sentences.english: The arbitrator's decision on the dispute is final and binding on the both parlies.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁人对争执所做的裁决为最后裁决，对双方均具有约束力。

name: manner
trans: 方式；习惯；种类；规矩；风俗

sentences.english: He felt some guilt over the manner of her death.
sentences.chinese: 她以这种方式死去，他心里有些内疚。

sentences.english: The issue will be resolved in a manner that is fair to both sides.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将用对双方都公平的方式来解决。

sentences.english: criticism of the manner in which the bishop was appointed
sentences.chinese: 对主教任命方式的批评

sentences.english: She has a calm relaxed manner.
sentences.chinese: 她举止镇定而从容。

sentences.english: Her children all had such good manners.
sentences.chinese: 她的孩子都很有礼貌。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something is done or happens

sentences.english: The law was amended to include women.
sentences.chinese: 该法律经修改把女性也包括在内。

sentences.english: The defendant later amended his evidence.
sentences.chinese: 被告后来修改了证词。

sentences.english: ‘Steve stole it – or rather borrowed it,’ he amended.
sentences.chinese: “史蒂夫偷的——应该说是借的。”他改口道。

detailed_translations.english: to correct or make small changes to something that is written or spoken

sentences.english: measures to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 刺激经济增长的措施

detailed_translations.english: an increase in amount, number, or size

sentences.english: She was offered employment in the sales office.
sentences.chinese: 她获聘在销售部工作。

sentences.english: terms and conditions of employment
sentences.chinese: 雇用条款和条件

sentences.english: Steve’s still looking for full-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫还在寻找全职工作。

sentences.english: the needs of women who combine paid employment and care for their families
sentences.chinese: 兼顾有薪工作和照料家庭的女性的需要

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作； 雇用； 使用
detailed_translations.english: the condition of having a paid job

sentences.english: The idea is that away from the frontline, soldiers can swop stories and wind down with those who understand their immediate problems.
sentences.chinese: 这一理念就是让战士远离前线，使他们能交换各自情况，能与理解他们心情的人取得联系。

name: inscrutable
trans: 神秘的；不可理解的；不能预测的；不可思议的

sentences.english: He stood silent and inscrutable.
sentences.chinese: 他静静地站着，让人难以捉摸。

detailed_translations.chinese: 神秘的；不可理解的；不能预测的；不可思议的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is inscrutable shows no emotion or reaction in the expression on their face so that it is impossible to know what they are feeling or thinking

sentences.english: Normally she wore little makeup, but this evening was clearly an exception.
sentences.chinese: 通常她很少化妆，可今晚显然是个例外。

sentences.english: There was some fatal flaw in his makeup, and as time went on he lapsed into long silences or became off-hand.
sentences.chinese: 他性格中有某种致命的缺陷，随着时间的推移，他要么陷入长时间沉默要么行为随便。

sentences.english: The ideological makeup of the unions is now radically different from what it had been.
sentences.chinese: 这些协会的意识形态构成如今与过去大相径庭。

detailed_translations.english: Makeup consists of things such as lipstick, eye shadow, and powder which some women put on their faces to make themselves look more attractive or which actors use to change or improve their appearance

sentences.english: They searched his luggage for illegal drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他们搜查他的行李看是否藏有毒品。

detailed_translations.english: the cases, bags etc that you carry when you are travelling

name: sustainable
trans: 可以忍受的；足可支撑的；养得起的；可持续的

sentences.english: The government should do more to promote sustainable agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 政府应该做更多工作来推动可持续农业的发展。

sentences.english: the sustainable use of rainforest resources
sentences.chinese: 雨林资源的可持续利用

sentences.english: Cycling is a totally sustainable form of transport.
sentences.chinese: 骑自行车是一种绝对环保的交通方式。

sentences.english: environmentally sustainable development
sentences.chinese: 生态环境的可持续发展

detailed_translations.english: able to continue without causing damage to the environment

name: heritage
trans: 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权

sentences.english: the importance of preserving the national heritage
sentences.chinese: 保护民族遗产的重要性

sentences.english: beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage
sentences.chinese: 属于我们遗产一部分的漂亮古建筑

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权
detailed_translations.english: the traditional beliefs, values, customs etc of a family, country, or society

name: marketable
trans: 市场的；可销售的；有销路的

sentences.english: The program is designed to provide students with real, marketable skills.
sentences.chinese: 本计划旨在让学生掌握符合市场需求的真正技能。

detailed_translations.chinese: 市场的；可销售的；有销路的
detailed_translations.english: marketable goods, skills etc can be sold easily because people want them

sentences.english: The fully inclusive fare for the trip is £22.
sentences.chinese: 这次出行的全部费用为22英镑。

sentences.english: The rent is £120 a week, inclusive of heating.
sentences.chinese: 房租连暖气费在内是每星期120英镑。

detailed_translations.english: an inclusive price or cost includes everything

sentences.english: Rough seas today prevented specially equipped ships from skimming oil off the water's surface.
sentences.chinese: 今天汹涌的海浪使特别装备的船只无法撇去浮在水面上的石油。

detailed_translations.english: If you skim something from the surface of a liquid, you remove it

name: consultation
trans: 咨询；磋商；[临床] 会诊；讨论会

sentences.english: They retired to another room for private consultation.
sentences.chinese: 他们退到另一房间秘密磋商。

sentences.english: This is a critical question that we must answer together through consultation and coordination.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个我们必须通过磋商和协调共同回答的关键问题。

detailed_translations.english: a discussion in which people who are affected by or involved in something can give their opinions

sentences.english: He advocated the removal of trade barriers.
sentences.chinese: 他提倡消除贸易壁垒。

sentences.english: Crowds burst through the barriers and ran onto the pitch.
sentences.chinese: 人群冲破围栏跑进球场。

sentences.english: The mountains form a natural barrier between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 群山构成了两国之间的天然屏障。

detailed_translations.english: a rule, problem etc that prevents people from doing something, or limits what they can do

sentences.english: See if you can rework your schedule and come up with practical ways to reduce the number of hours you're on call.
sentences.chinese: 看看你能否修改你的时间表，想出切实可行的方法来减少你待命的时间。

detailed_translations.english: If you rework something such as an idea or a piece of writing, you reorganize it and make changes to it in order to improve it or bring it up to date

sentences.english: If my calculations are correct, we’re about ten miles from Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 如果我计算得没错的话，我们离埃克塞特大约十英里。

sentences.english: Score one point for each correct answer .
sentences.chinese: 答对一题得一分。

sentences.english: You are absolutely correct, the Missouri is the longest river in the US.
sentences.chinese: 你说的完全正确，密苏里河是美国最长的河流。

sentences.english: Some eyesight problems are relatively easy to correct.
sentences.chinese: 有些视力问题比较容易矫正。

detailed_translations.english: having no mistakes
to make something right or to make it work the way it should

name: futures
trans: 期货；未来，前途（future的复数形式）

sentences.english: The spokesman said no decision on the proposal was likely in the immediate future.
sentences.chinese: 该发言人称近期不太可能有有关该提案的决议。

sentences.english: He was making plans for the future.
sentences.chinese: 他正在为将来制定计划。

detailed_translations.chinese: 期货；未来，前途（future的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: The future is the period of time that will come after the present, or the things that will happen then

sentences.english: small pearl buttons
sentences.chinese: 小的珍珠纽扣

sentences.english: A button was missing from his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的衬衫上掉了一颗纽扣。

sentences.english: She undid (=  unfastened  ) the buttons of her blouse.
sentences.chinese: 她解开衬衫的纽扣。

detailed_translations.english: a small round flat object on your shirt, coat etc that you pass through a hole to fasten it
to fasten clothes with buttons, or to be fastened with buttons

name: ticket
trans: 票；入场券，标签；（美）候选人名单；证明书；交通罚款单
加标签于；指派；对…开出交通违规罚单

sentences.english: Slow down or you'll get a ticket.
sentences.chinese: 开慢点儿，否则你会接到一张罚款通知单。

sentences.english: parking/speeding ticket
sentences.chinese: 违法停车/超速行驶罚款单

detailed_translations.english: a printed note ordering you to pay money because you have done something illegal while driving or parking your car

name: palatial
trans: 宫殿似的；宏伟的；壮丽的

sentences.english: a palatial country residence
sentences.chinese: 富丽堂皇的乡村住宅

detailed_translations.chinese: 宫殿似的；宏伟的；壮丽的
detailed_translations.english: a palatial building etc is large and beautifully decorated

name: commercial
trans: 商业的；营利的；靠广告收入的

sentences.english: Our top priorities must be profit and commercial growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须把利润和贸易增长作为我们的第一要务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 商业的， 商务的； 商品化的， 商业性的
detailed_translations.english: related to business and the buying and selling of goods and services

name: tramp
trans: 流浪；践踏，踩；脚步沉重地行走
流浪者；沉重的脚步声；徒步旅行

sentences.english: I met a tramp and gave him some money on my way home.
sentences.chinese: 我回家的路上碰到了一个流浪汉并给了他一些钱。

sentences.english: Five minutes inside the soup-kitchen in Hackney, east London, and I immediately understand what Orwell meant - that the "typical tramp" does not exist.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦东面哈克尼的汤棚里呆了五分钟，我立刻明白了奥威尔那句“‘典型的流浪汉’不存在”是什么意思。

sentences.english: A tramp does not see such a meal twice in the year, in the spike or out of it.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个流浪汉而言，不论是在收容站还是在外面，如此丰盛的饭食他是见不到第二次的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has no home or job and moves from place to place, often asking for food or money

sentences.english: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.english: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

sentences.english: a 55 mph speed limit
sentences.chinese: 55英里的时速限制

sentences.english: The public is not allowed within a 2-mile limit of the missile site.
sentences.chinese: 众不得进入导弹发射场两英里范围内。

detailed_translations.english: the greatest or least amount, number, speed etc that is allowed

sentences.english: ...important improvements in the situation of debtor countries.
sentences.chinese: …债务国境况的重大改善。

detailed_translations.english: a person, group, or organization that owes money

name: commitment
trans: 承诺，保证；委托；承担义务；献身

sentences.english: Are you ready to make a long-term commitment ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否准备好作出长久的承诺？

detailed_translations.english: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way

name: endorse
trans: 背书；认可；签署；赞同；在背面签名

sentences.english: I can endorse their opinion wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 我可以全心全意地支持他们的观点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 背书；认可；签署；赞同；在背面签名
detailed_translations.english: to express formal support or approval for someone or something

sentences.english: the distinction between fantasy and reality
sentences.chinese: 幻想和现实之间的区别

sentences.english: TV is used as an escape from reality .
sentences.chinese: 电视成了逃避现实的一种方式。

sentences.english: I think the government has lost touch with reality (= no longer understands what is real or true ) .
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府已经脱离了现实。

sentences.english: political realities
sentences.chinese: 政治现实

sentences.english: The paperless office may one day become a reality .
sentences.chinese: 无纸化办公室有一天可能会成为现实。

detailed_translations.english: what actually happens or is true, not what is imagined or thought

name: board
trans: 上（飞机、车、船等）；用板盖上；给提供膳宿

sentences.english: a board meeting
sentences.chinese: 董事会会议

sentences.english: a board member
sentences.chinese: 董事会成员

detailed_translations.english: a group of people in a company or other organization who make the rules and important decisions

sentences.english: He was one of the most powerful men in Bohemia.
sentences.chinese: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.english: a very influential and powerful family
sentences.chinese: 很有权势的家庭

sentences.english: a powerful speech
sentences.chinese: 有感染力的演讲

detailed_translations.english: a powerful person, organization, group etc is able to control and influence events and other people’s actions

name: depression
trans: 沮丧；洼地；不景气；忧愁；低气压区

sentences.english: Mr. Thomas was suffering from depression.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯先生当时正受抑郁症折磨。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抑郁， 沮丧； 不景气， 萧条； 洼地， 凹陷
detailed_translations.english: the period during the 1930s when there was not much business activity and not many jobs

sentences.english: Cuba is a composite of diverse traditions and people.
sentences.chinese: 古巴是一个不同传统和民族的融合体。

detailed_translations.english: something made up of different parts or materials
made up of different parts or materials

sentences.english: Postal workers are threatening a strike if they don’t receive a pay increase.
sentences.chinese: 邮政工人威胁如果不加薪，他们就要罢工。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you will cause someone harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

name: downsize
trans: 以较小尺寸设计；缩小尺寸；裁减人数

sentences.english: American manufacturing organizations have been downsizing their factories.
sentences.chinese: 美国制造商们一直在缩小他们工厂的规模。

sentences.english: ...today's downsized economy.
sentences.chinese: … 今天萎缩了的经济。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缩小尺寸； 缩小规模
detailed_translations.english: To downsize something such as a business or industry means to make it smaller

sentences.english: Were Indians “mindlessly aping” Western lifestyles more or less when India had its idiotic policy of autarky?
sentences.chinese: 印度自给自足的的白痴政策是多少在“盲目模仿”西方的生活方式么？

sentences.english: Pakistanis' growing sense of autarky has led them to overplay their hand in negotiations with the United States.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦日益增强的自给自足意识使得他们在同美国谈判时过高地估计了自己。

detailed_translations.english: (esp of a political unit) a system or policy of economic self-sufficiency aimed at removing the need for imports

sentences.english: There has been a sharp slowdown in economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 在经济增长方面一直存在急剧的减速。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in activity or speed

sentences.english: To balance the books, he raised some taxes, notably VAT, but three-quarters of the savings will come from spending cuts.
sentences.chinese: 为了平衡账簿，他增加了部分税收，特别是增值税，但是四分之三的节余将来自削减开支。

sentences.english: According to the new rules, retail goods purchased online will no longer be treated as personal postal articles but as imported goods, which carry tariffs, import VAT and consumption tax.
sentences.chinese: 根据新的政策，在网上购买的零售商品不再属于个人邮政物品，而属于进口物品，将会加上关税、进口增值税和消费税。

sentences.english: Through empirical analysis it can be certain that the VAT restructuring on the tax revenues, fixed assets investment and economic operations and the impact of unforeseen circumstances not unanimous.
sentences.chinese: 通过实证分析可以看到，增值税转型对税收收入、固定资产投资及经济运行产生的影响与预见的状况并不一致。

detailed_translations.chinese: 增值税〔英国和欧盟附加在商品价格和服务费上的税〕
detailed_translations.english: a tax added to the price of goods and services in Britain and the EU

sentences.english: A police investigation yesterday absolved the police of all blame in the incident.
sentences.chinese: 警方昨天的调查为其开脱了在这件事故中所有的责任。

trans: 延期；耽搁；被耽搁或推迟的时间

sentences.chinese: 别犹豫——即刻去函索取信息。

sentences.english: a farm labourer
sentences.chinese: 农场工人

to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time

trans: 工厂，车间；植物；设备；庄稼

sentences.chinese: 别忘记给植物浇水。

sentences.english: a huge chemical plant
sentences.chinese: 一座大型化工厂

sentences.chinese: 居民们帮助我们种了树。
